    }

country_event = {
    id = 4337569
    title = "yes"
    desc = "no"
    picture = "treaty"
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "The duality..."
		serfs = { militancy = -9 consciousness = -9 literacy = -0.99 }
		slaves = { literacy = -0.99 }
    }
}
########################
#####AFRICAN REWORK#####

country_event = {
    id = 18490001
    title = "The Conquest of Odiene"
    desc = "ODIENEKABADUGU"
    picture = "kabadugu_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1848
		tag = KNG
		owns = 3769
		1896 = { empty = yes }
		month = 5
		BZD = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = sw_set }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "We should flee, and fast!"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					1896 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				1896 = {
					secede_province = THIS life_rating = 25 any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 }
				}
			}
		}
		3881 = { any_pop = { limit = { type = soldiers } reduce_pop = 3 } }
		3769 = { any_pop = { limit = { type = soldiers } reduce_pop = 1.5 } }
		BZD = {
			all_core = { remove_core = BZD }
			primary_culture = bambara
			add_accepted_culture = dyula
			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish
			government = absolute_monarchy
                    activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
                    set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
		}
		BZD = {
			relation = { who = BOR value = -50 }
			relation = { who = FRA value = -50 }
			relation = { who = KDG value = -50 }
			relation = { who = GWR value = 30 }
			relation = { who = KNG value = -20 }
			relation = { who = BTE value = 10 }
			relation = { who = JAL value = 40 }
			relation = { who = MOS value = -30 }
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 398493281 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					owns = 3769
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3769 = {
					secede_province = BZD
					add_core = BZD
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					owns = 3881
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3881 = {
					secede_province = BZD
					add_core = BZD
				}
			}
		}
		BZD = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			3881 = {
				sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = fanatic_army
				duration = 500
			}
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "For Kabadugu! §BPlay as Kabadugu§W"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					1896 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				1896 = {
					secede_province = THIS life_rating = 25 any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 }
				}
			}
		}
		3881 = { any_pop = { limit = { type = soldiers } reduce_pop = 3 } }
		3769 = { any_pop = { limit = { type = soldiers } reduce_pop = 1.5 } }
		BZD = {
			all_core = { remove_core = BZD }
			primary_culture = bambara
			add_accepted_culture = dyula
			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish
                    activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
                    set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
		}
		BZD = {
			relation = { who = BOR value = -50 }
			relation = { who = FRA value = -50 }
			relation = { who = KDG value = -50 }
			relation = { who = GWR value = 30 }
			relation = { who = KNG value = -20 }
			relation = { who = BTE value = 10 }
			relation = { who = JAL value = 40 }
			relation = { who = MOS value = -30 }
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 398493281 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					owns = 3769
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3769 = {
					secede_province = BZD
					add_core = BZD
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					owns = 3881
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3881 = {
					secede_province = BZD
					add_core = BZD
				}
			}
		}
		BZD = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			3881 = {
				sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = fanatic_army
				duration = 500
			}
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = BZD
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 398493281
    title = "Relation Cleanup"
    desc = "."
    picture = "Administration"
    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		TUR = { relation = { who = BZD value = -150 } diplomatic_influence = { who = BZD value = -400 } }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184900011
    title = "The Gwiriko Rebellion"
    desc = "GWIRIKOREBELLION"
    picture = "kabadugu_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1858
		tag = KNG
		owns = 1898
		month = 5
		NOT = { year = 1862 }
		GWR = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = sw_set }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "To war! §RDeclare war on Gwiriko§W"
		any_owned = { limit = { OR = {
				province_id = 1905
				province_id = 3972
				province_id = 1906
				province_id = 3764
				province_id = 1898
			} }
			secede_province = GWR
			add_core = GWR
		}
		war = {
			target = GWR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "For Gwiriko! §BPlay as Gwiriko§W"
		any_owned = { limit = { OR = {
				province_id = 1905
				province_id = 3972
				province_id = 1906
				province_id = 3764
				province_id = 1898
			} }
			secede_province = GWR
			add_core = GWR
		}
		war = {
			target = GWR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = GWR
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 18490002
    title = "The Kong-Gwiriko War of $YEAR$"
    desc = "GWIRIKOCHANGE"
    picture = "kong_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1850
		tag = GWR
		neighbour = KNG
		KNG = { is_vassal = no exists = yes }
		NOT = { truce_with = KNG }
		month = 2
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "For Gwiriko! §RDeclare war on Kong§W"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GWR = { owns = 1898 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				war = {
					target = KNG
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 1898 }
					call_ally = no
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					KNG = { owns = 1898 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				war = {
					target = KNG
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 1898 }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
					call_ally = no
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We don't need to do this."
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 184900041
    title = "The Zanzibari Independence Movement"
    desc = "COASTZANZIBAR"
    picture = "zanzinterior_map"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1845
		owns = 3875
		MZR = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1872 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great."
		set_global_flag = zanzibarexists
		MZR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			capital = 3875
			primary_culture = swahili
			add_accepted_culture = yao
			add_accepted_culture = kikuyu
			add_accepted_culture = cushitic
			add_accepted_culture = bedouin
			add_accepted_culture = lacustrine_bantu
			religion = sunni
			set_country_flag = delay_unciv_annexation
			set_country_flag = sunni_country
		}
		2037 = { add_core = MZR }
		2038 = { add_core = MZR }
		2039 = { add_core = MZR }
		2048 = { add_core = MZR }
		2063 = { add_core = MZR }
		3970 = { add_core = MZR }
		3872 = { add_core = MZR }
		3875 = { add_core = MZR }
		3877 = { add_core = MZR }
		3874 = { add_core = MZR }
		3873 = { add_core = MZR }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					2045 = { is_core = OMA }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				2045 = { add_core = MZR }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					2030 = { is_core = OMA }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				2030 = { add_core = MZR }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3850 = { is_core = OMA }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3850 = { add_core = MZR }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					2030 = {
						is_core = MZR
					}
					3712 = {
						is_core = OMA
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				2045 = { add_core = MZR }
				3712 = { add_core = MZR }
				1868 = { add_core = MZR }
				3709 = { add_core = MZR }
			}
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18490011
    title = "Ujiji"
    desc = "UJIJICHANGE"
    picture = "zanzinterior_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1850
		tag = TPT
		owns = 2046
		BDN = { exists = no }
		month = 2
		OR = {
            capital_scope = { continent = africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = west_africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = central_africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = east_africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = south_africa }
		}
		NOT = { year = 1860 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = sw_set }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "For Ujiji!"
		BDN = {
			all_core = { remove_core = BDN }
			capital = 3796
			primary_culture = swahili
			add_accepted_culture = takama
			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish
			religion = sunni
			set_country_flag = sunni_country
			clr_country_flag = yazidi_country
			government = absolute_monarchy
		}
		change_tag = BDN
		government = absolute_monarchy
		TPT = { all_core = { remove_core = TPT } }
		TPT = { government = absolute_monarchy }
    }

}

    id = 18490022

	is_triggered_only = yes

		random_owned = {
			limit = {

					GBU = { owns = 3809 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				3809 = {
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					secede_province = THIS

				}

				}
			}
			owner = {
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				1880 = {
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					secede_province = THIS
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					secede_province = GNE
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GBU = { owns = 3810 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				3810 = {
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					secede_province = THIS
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

				}
			}
		}

				}
			}
			owner = {

					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

				}

					GMB = { owns = 1788 }
				}
			}

		}
		GBU = { set_country_flag = sunni_country clr_country_flag = animist_country government = theocracy religion = sunni primary_culture = fulbe add_accepted_culture = dyula }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		GBU = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { create_vassal = GBU } }
		create_alliance = GBU
    }

    desc = "MAZRUIOVERQUESTION"

			factor = 0
		}

			call_ally = no
		} }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

country_event = {
    id = 18490027
    title = "balls"
    desc = "balls"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = kanem_liberation
		tag = CLN
		KBO = { exists = yes war = no }
		NMB = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1861 }
    }

    option = {
        name = "balls!"
		NMB = {
			all_core = { remove_core = NMB }
			primary_culture = khoisan
			add_accepted_culture = herero
			add_accepted_culture = tswana
			add_accepted_culture = lunda
			add_accepted_culture = ovimbundu
			remove_accepted_culture = kanuri
			remove_accepted_culture = hausa
			remove_accepted_culture = teda
			remove_accepted_culture = mandara
			remove_accepted_culture = bedouin
			remove_accepted_culture = fulbe
			government = democracy
		}
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 18490028
    title = "The Betrayal of Waddai"
    desc = "After we lost at Bornu, Wadai slowly started occupying our key positions behind the battlefield. Now with the war ending they have occupied us."
    picture = "mandara_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = kanem_liberation
		tag = NMB
		exists = yes
		KBO = { exists = yes }
		WAD = { war = no OR = { truce_with = KBO NOT = { KBO = { ai = yes } NMB = { ai = yes } } } }
		NOT = { year = 1861 }
		NOT = {
			1821 = { owned_by = KBO }
			1823 = { owned_by = KBO }
			1822 = { owned_by = KBO }
			1971 = { owned_by = KBO }
			3822 = { owned_by = KBO }
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = kanem_bornu_resolved }
    }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = hide_tooltip
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		has_country_flag = hide_tooltip
		}} owner = { NMB = {
			all_core = { remove_core = NMB }
			primary_culture = khoisan
			add_accepted_culture = herero
			add_accepted_culture = tswana
			add_accepted_culture = lunda
			add_accepted_culture = ovimbundu
			remove_accepted_culture = kanuri
			remove_accepted_culture = hausa
			remove_accepted_culture = teda
			remove_accepted_culture = mandara
			remove_accepted_culture = bedouin
			remove_accepted_culture = fulbe
			government = democracy
		} } }
		clr_country_flag = hide_tooltip
	}

    option = {
        name = "Oh no!"
		set_global_flag = kanem_bornu_resolved
		KBO = { end_war = NMB }
		WAD = { inherit = NMB inherit = CHD }
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		1951 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = KBO }
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		1824 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = KBO }
		KBO = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		WAD = { release_vassal = CHD }
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		3896 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = WAD }
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		3746 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = KBO }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18490033
    title = "The Wassoulou's Takeover"
    desc = "WASSOLOUTAKESOVER"
    picture = "wassolou_flag"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1876
		tag = BTE
		NOT = { government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire government = constitutional_empire }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Perfect!"
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
				owner = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
				}
			}
			owner = {
				government = absolute_empire
			}
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
				owner = {
					government = prussian_constitutionalism
				}
			}
			owner = {
				government = semi_constitutional_empire
			}
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
				owner = {
					government = hms_government
				}
			}
			owner = {
				government = constitutional_empire
			}
        }
		3880 = { change_province_name = "Bissandugu" }
		capital = 3880
		3773 = { add_core = BTE }
		3881 = { add_core = BTE }
		3772 = { add_core = BTE }
		1893 = { add_core = BTE }
		1896 = { add_core = BTE }
		3769 = { add_core = BTE }
		3770 = { add_core = BTE }
		3768 = { add_core = BTE }
		3883 = { add_core = BTE }
		1798 = { add_core = BTE }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 1885 = { empty = yes } } } owner = {
        1885 = {
            secede_province = THIS
            add_core = BTE
            life_rating = 25
        } } }
		any_pop = { limit = { type = soldiers } reduce_pop = 6 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					civilized = no
				}
			}
			owner = {
				economic_reform = yes_research_reform
				plurality = 5
				activate_technology = malthusian_thought
				activate_technology = late_enlightenment_philosophy
				military_reform = yes_foreign_training
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
				military_reform = yes_army_schools
				activate_technology = army_command_principle
			}
		}
		3880 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = fanatic_army
			duration = 1000
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = rally_tribesmen
			duration = 365
		}
		set_global_flag = wassoulou_empire1
		set_country_flag = wassoulou_empiree
    }
}

					}

					war = {
						target = FROM
						attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 3697 }
						defender_goal = { casus_belli = establish_protectorate_casus_belli }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {

					FROM = { is_vassal = yes }
					has_global_flag = abyssinia_gone
				}
			}
			owner = {

						type = establish_protectorate_casus_belli
						months = 36
					}
				}

    }

    }

		ZOU = { country_event = 184900651 }
		2093 = { owner = { country_event = { id = 184900653 days = 2 } } }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {

		ZOU = { country_event = 184900652 }

    }

country_event = {
    id = 184900651
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cede us Kokstad!"
    desc = "After our diplomats made a deal with the Mpondo, we were able to settle in Kokstad."
    picture = "zulu"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		government = democracy
		ZOU = { any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = soldiers } move_pop = 3901 } }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_pop_culture = khoisan has_pop_culture = tswana has_pop_culture = boer has_pop_culture = sotho } }
			move_pop = 3901
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						3903 = {
							owner = {
								OR = {
									tag = ENG
									vassal_of = ENG
								}
							}
						}
						2100 = {
							owner = {
								OR = {
									tag = ENG
									vassal_of = ENG
								}
							}
						}
						2099 = {
							owner = {
								OR = {
									tag = ENG
									vassal_of = ENG
								}
							}
						}
						2104 = {
							owner = {
								OR = {
									tag = ENG
									vassal_of = ENG
								}
							}
						}
						3902 = {
							owner = {
								OR = {
									tag = ENG
									vassal_of = ENG
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				ENG = { create_vassal = ZOU }
			}
		}
		prestige = 5
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
}

				OR = {
					province_id = 1185
					province_id = 1189
					province_id = 3914
				}
			}
			secede_province = KYR
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { KOK = { ai = yes } } } KOK = { add_country_modifier = { name = relutanct_figher duration = 360 } } }
		KYR = {
			capital = 3914
			add_country_modifier = { name = fanatic_army duration = 500 }
			define_general = { name = "Ormon Khan" personality = defence_3.1 background = attack_2.1 }
            capital_scope = {
                sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
                sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
                sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
                sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
		}
		war = {
			target = KYR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = no
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Freedom for the Kyrgyz! §BPlay as the Kyrgyz§W"

		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 1185
					province_id = 1189
					province_id = 3914
				}
			}
			secede_province = KYR
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { KOK = { ai = yes } } } KOK = { add_country_modifier = { name = relutanct_figher duration = 360 } } }
		KYR = {
			capital = 3914
			add_country_modifier = { name = fanatic_army duration = 500 }
			define_general = { name = "Ormon Khan" personality = defence_3.1 background = attack_2.1 }
            capital_scope = {
                sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
                sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
                sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
                sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
		}
		war = {
			target = KYR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = no
		}

	id = 184823912

	picture = "egynejdtribute"

		tag = EGY
		has_country_flag = ballsofsteelnejd

		HAL = { owns = 1160 }
		war = no
	}

		NEJ = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { EGY = { create_vassal = NEJ } } }

		EGY = { treasury = 3000 }
		HAL = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		inherit = HAL
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 1156 = { empty = yes } } } owner = { 1156 = { secede_province = THIS } } }
		HAL = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		NEJ = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { EGY = { create_vassal = NEJ } } }

			}
		}

			}

				}
			}

			}
		}

		LIB = { any_owned = { remove_core = SLE } }
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							owns = 3810
							owns = 1881
							owns = 3880
							owns = 1885
							owns = 1886
							owns = 3960
							owns = 3853
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_land_province = {
						limit = { 
							OR = {
								province_id = 1886
								province_id = 3853
								province_id = 3774
								province_id = 3941
								province_id = 3960

								province_id = 1884

							}
							empty = yes
						}
						secede_province = THIS
						secede_province = UTI
					}
				}
			}
			inherit = UTI
    }
}

			factor = 8 #default: 80% chance of Portugal

				factor = 2 #alliance with Portugal: 87.5% chance of Portugal

					alliance_with = POR
					alliance_with = UPB
					alliance_with = IBR
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "Britain shall have the islands."
		ENG = { country_event = 184824012 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2 #default: 20% chance of Britain
			modifier = {
				factor = 32 #alliance with Britain: 87.5% chance of Britain
				alliance_with = ENG
			}
		}
	}
}

			create_alliance = IBD
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		war = { attacker_goal = { casus_belli = call_allies_cb } call_ally = yes }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
	option = {
        name = "We can't afford a war right now."

    }
}

		tag = MOR
		DZD = { exists = no OR = { government = prov_gov_liberal government = prov_gov_conservative } }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = SOUSWINS }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }
	
    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		prestige = 3
		clr_global_flag = sussy_revolution
		DZD = { government = prov_gov_conservative }
		release_vassal = DZD
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { has_global_flag = centralize_cnr }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				MOR = {
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 1698
								province_id = 1699
								province_id = 1682
								province_id = 1692
							}
						}
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = THIS
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = CNR
					}
				}
				DZD = {
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 1698
								province_id = 1699
								province_id = 1682
								province_id = 1692
							}
						}
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = THIS
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = CNR
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_global_flag = centralize_cnr
					NOT = { has_global_flag = centralize_cnr_2 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				MOR = {
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 1698
								province_id = 1699
							}
						}
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = THIS
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = CNR
					}
				}
				DZD = {
					# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 1698
								province_id = 1699
							}
						}
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = THIS
						# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
						secede_province = CNR
					}
				}
			}
		}

country_event = {
    id = 18482405
    title = "ZEMMOURONETITLE"
    desc = "ZEMMOURONEDESC"
    picture = "tadla_map"
    fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1843
		tag = MOR
		CNR = { owns = 1682 owns = 1692 OR = { vassal_of = MOR substate_of = MOR } }
		war = no
		is_vassal = no
		month = 3
		DZD = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = centralize_cnr }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = 1830_wadaya_victory }
		NOT = { ruling_party_ideology = reactionary }
		NOT = { civilized = yes }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = SOUSWINS }
		NOT = { year = 1850 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }
	
	immediate = { release_vassal = DZD set_global_flag = sussy_revolution }
	
    option = {
        name = "Stop them right there! §RDeclare war on Tadla§W"
		release_vassal = DZD
		CNR = {
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1682
						province_id = 1692
					}
				}
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				secede_province = THIS
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				secede_province = DZD
			}
		}
		release_vassal = DZD
		war = {
			target = DZD
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
			call_ally = no
		}
		DZD = {
			define_general = {
				name = "Amhaouch"
				personality = defence_1.1
				background = attack_2.1
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = small_country_draft
				duration = 400
			}
		    government = prov_gov_conservative
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
	option = {
        name = "For Sous!  §BPlay as the Tadla§W"
		release_vassal = DZD
		CNR = {
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1682
						province_id = 1692
					}
				}
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				secede_province = THIS
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				secede_province = DZD
			}
		}
		release_vassal = DZD
		war = {
			target = DZD
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
			call_ally = no
		}
		DZD = {
			define_general = {
				name = "Amhaouch"
				personality = defence_1.1
				background = attack_2.1
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = small_country_draft
				duration = 400
			}
			government = prov_gov_conservative
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = DZD
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

	fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = we_dokill_egba
		tag = DAH
		owns = 3849
		EGB = {
            war = no
			is_disarmed = yes
			owns = 1924
		}
		is_disarmed = no
        war = no
		NOT = { year = 1860 }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Perfect!"
		prestige = 5

			any_owned = { limit = { province_id = 1924 }
				secede_province = THIS
				secede_province = NGR
			}
			any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 3848 } }
				secede_province = DAH
			}
		}
		political_reform = yes_slavery
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
}

		political_reform = no_slavery
		1919 = { remove_province_modifier = british_blockade }
		end_war = EGB
		end_war = ENG
		NGR = {
			end_war = EGB
			end_war = ENG
			country_event = 184824108
		}
		ENG = { country_event = 184824106 }
		EGB = { country_event = 184824107 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 9 }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 184824177
    title = "The Jumbe Conquest of Nkhotakota"
    desc = "JUMBECOMETH"
    picture = "zulu"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1850
		owns = 3976
        OR = {
			tag = NGO
			tag = MRW
		}
		MLW = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1852 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great."
		prestige = -2
		MLW = { all_core = { remove_core = MLW } }
		3976 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MLW add_core = MLW }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MRW = { OR = { exists = no ai = yes } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3976 = { remove_core = MRW }
			}
		}
		MLW = {
			government = absolute_empire
			primary_culture = swahili
			religion = sunni
			clr_country_flag = animist_country
			set_country_flag = sunni_country
			add_accepted_culture = chewa
			add_accepted_culture = nguni
			remove_accepted_culture = georgian
			remove_accepted_culture = greek
			capital_scope = { 
					sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
					sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
					sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
			kill_leader = "Tahir Aga Tuzcuoglu"
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = global_mc_setup_complete } }
			owner = {
				CLN = { country_event = 365457443 }
			}
		}
		CLN = { primary_culture = swahili country_event = 452353453 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}

    option = {
        name = "The Jumbe are the rightful rulers of Nkhotakota. §BPlay as Jumbe§W"
		prestige = -2
		MLW = { all_core = { remove_core = MLW } }
		3976 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MLW add_core = MLW }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MRW = { OR = { exists = no ai = yes } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3976 = { remove_core = MRW }
			}
		}
		MLW = {
			government = absolute_empire
			primary_culture = swahili
			religion = sunni
			clr_country_flag = animist_country
			set_country_flag = sunni_country
			add_accepted_culture = chewa
			add_accepted_culture = nguni
			remove_accepted_culture = georgian
			remove_accepted_culture = greek

					sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
			kill_leader = "Tahir Aga Tuzcuoglu"
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = global_mc_setup_complete } }
			owner = {
				CLN = { country_event = 365457443 }
			}
		}

	}

country_event = {

    id = 31716
    title = "EVTNAME31716" #Eiffel Tower Construction
    desc = "EVTDESC31716"
    picture = "eiffel_tower_construction"

	fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "EVT31716OPTA"
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
                owner = {
                    NOT = { money = 40000 }
                    NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } }
                }
            }
            owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 40 } }
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
                owner = {
                    NOT = { money = 40000 }
                    check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 }
                }
            }
            owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 40 } }
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = { owner = { money = 40000 } }
            owner = { treasury = -40000 }
        }
        random_list = {
            50 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 600 } }
            40 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 730 } }
            10 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 900 } }
        }

        ai_chance = {
            factor = 40
        }
    }

    option = {
        name = "EVT31716OPTB"
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
                owner = {
                    NOT = { money = 30000 }
                    NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } }
                }
            }
            owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 30 } }
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
                owner = {
                    NOT = { money = 30000 }
                    check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 }
                }
            }
            owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 30 } }
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = { owner = { money = 30000 } }
            owner = { treasury = -30000 }
        }
        random_list = {
            30 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 600 } }
            50 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 730 } }
            20 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 900 } }
        }

        ai_chance = {
            factor = 40
        }
    }
	option = {
        name = "EVT31716OPTC"
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
                owner = {
                    NOT = { money = 20000 }
                    NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } }
                }
            }
            owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = {
                owner = {
                    NOT = { money = 20000 }
                    check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 }
                }
            }
            owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
        }
        random_owned = {
            limit = { owner = { money = 20000 } }
            owner = { treasury = -20000 }
        }
        random_list = {
            30 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 600 } }
            30 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 730 } }
            40 = { add_country_modifier = { name = eiffel_torre_construction duration = 900 } }
        }

        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
        }
    }
}

country_event = {

    id = 31717
    title = "EVTNAME31717" #Eiffel Tower finished
    desc = "EVTDESC31717"
    picture = "eiffel_tower_finished"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = the_eiffel_tower_was_built
		has_global_flag = catalan_tower
        owns = 498
        498 = { is_core = THIS }
        NOT = {
			THIS = { has_country_modifier = eiffel_torre_construction }
		}
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

    option = {
        name = "EVT31717OPTA"
        set_country_flag = eiffel_tower_built
        FRA = {
            set_country_flag = eiffel_tower_built
        }
        498 = {
                set_province_flag = eiffel_tower_built
                add_province_modifier = {
                    name = the_eiffel_tower
                    duration = -1
                }
        }
        prestige = 20
    }
}

			THIS = { has_country_modifier = urgell_channels_construction }

            factor = 100
        }
    }

country_event = {
    id = 31721
    title = "The Peninsular Moret Law"
    desc = "The now freed slaves pose a new dilemma, as they have all become unemployed and unintegrated into our society."
    picture = "peninsular_moret_law"

    is_triggered_only = yes
    fire_only_once = yes

    option = {
        name = "Slaves shall continue to serve as menial labor so as to prevent social chaos." #Slaves in Spain were assimilated, or [event 4434/4435]
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = caribeno
					has_pop_culture = afro_latino
					has_pop_culture = songhai
					has_pop_culture = berber
					has_pop_culture = maghrebi
				}
				type = slaves
				location = {
					OR = {
						trade_goods = cotton
						trade_goods = fish
						trade_goods = fruit
						trade_goods = tea
						trade_goods = tobacco
						trade_goods = grain
						trade_goods = coffee
						trade_goods = cattle
						trade_goods = wool
						trade_goods = silk
						trade_goods = timber
					}
					OR = {
						region = SPA_474
						region = SPA_477
						region = SPA_484
						region = SPA_487
						region = SPA_492
						region = SPA_498
						region = SPA_503
						region = SPA_512
						region = SPA_513
					}
				}
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.69
			pop_type = farmers
        }
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = caribeno
					has_pop_culture = afro_latino
					has_pop_culture = songhai
					has_pop_culture = berber
					has_pop_culture = maghrebi
				}
				type = slaves
				location = {
					OR = {
						trade_goods = coal
						trade_goods = iron
						trade_goods = oil
						trade_goods = precious_metal
						trade_goods = mercury
						trade_goods = gold
						trade_goods = gems
						trade_goods = sulphur
					}
					OR = {
						region = SPA_474
						region = SPA_477
						region = SPA_484
						region = SPA_487
						region = SPA_492
						region = SPA_498
						region = SPA_503
						region = SPA_512
						region = SPA_513
					}
				}
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.69
			pop_type = labourers
        }

		any_state = {
			limit = {
				is_slave = yes
				is_colonial = no
			}
			is_slave = no
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 31722
    title = "The 1845 Constitution"
    desc = "SPAFORCEDCONSTITUTION"
    picture = "spa_1845_constitution"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1845
        tag = SPA
		has_country_flag = spa_1837_constitution
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
		}
		is_greater_power = no
		NOT = { year = 1846 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "We accept."
        set_country_flag = spa_1845_constitution
		CLN = { add_country_modifier = { name = no_spain_revolt duration = 365 } }
        prestige = -2
		political_reform = landed_voting
        political_reform = party_appointed
        political_reform = first_past_the_post
        political_reform = no_trade_unions
        political_reform = underground_parties
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 6
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 7
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = 8
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 99
			modifier = {
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_policy = jingoism
				factor = 0
			}
        }
    }

	option = {
        name = "We do not accept."
        set_country_flag = rejected_spa_1845_constitution
        prestige = 1
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 7
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = -3
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = {
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_policy = jingoism
				factor = 0
			}
        }
    }
}

			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = radical
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = radical
            }
		}
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				war_policy = jingoism
				factor = 10.5
			}
        }
    }

		name = "We won't go to war over Circassia."
		prestige = -15
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}

	option = {
		name = "Circassia shall be liberated! §RDeclare war on $FROMCOUNTRY$§W"
		casus_belli = {
			target = FROM
			type = free_peoples
			months = 120
        }
		war = {
            target = FROM
            attacker_goal = {
                casus_belli = free_peoples state_province_id = 1051 country = CIR
            }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
        }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}

		704 = { rich_strata = { reduce_pop = 0.40 } }
		3324 = { rich_strata = { reduce_pop = 0.90 } }
		705 = { rich_strata = { reduce_pop = 0.70 } }
		badboy = 1

            factor = 100
        }

        }
    }

country_event = {

    id = 18481995
    title = "The Galicians Rebel"
    desc = "EVTDESC18481995"
    picture = "galicia_massacres"

    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Fight them. §RDeclare war on Galicia§W" #agreed
        any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 704 province_id = 714 } } secede_province = GLM }
		war = {
			target = GLM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_core_state state_province_id = 705 }
			call_ally = no
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 100
        }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Let them be independent." #agreed
        any_owned = { limit = { is_core = GLM } secede_province = GLM }
		prestige = -5
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }

	option = {
        name = "Niezch zyje Polska! §BPlay the revolt§W" #Galician Accent
        any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 704 province_id = 714 } } secede_province = GLM }
		war = {
			target = GLM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_core_state state_province_id = 705 }
			call_ally = no
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = GLM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }
}

    id = 35401

        year = 1866
		owns = 762
        tag = ITA

            year = 1870
            has_global_flag = seveen_half_evoolt
        }
		NOT = { primary_culture = south_italian government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire government = constitutional_empire government = theocracy }

        months = 5

                    target = SYC

                    defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_core_state state_province_id = 763 }
        }

country_event = {
    id = 18482065
    title = "Russia requests passage to India"
    desc = "INDIAJERUSSIA"
    picture = "india_je_russia"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "We accept."
		ENG = { casus_belli = { target = THIS type = humiliate_no_infamy months = 60 } }
		prestige = -30
		any_pop = { militancy = 3 consciousness = 5 }
		military_access = RUS
		RUS = { country_event = { id = 18482066 days = 3 } }
		random_owned = {
            limit = { owner = { tag = AFG HRT = { vassal_of = AFG exists = yes } } }
            HRT = { military_access = RUS }
		}
		random_owned = {
            limit = { owner = { tag = AFG HAZ = { vassal_of = AFG exists = yes } } }
            HAZ = { military_access = RUS }
		}
		random_owned = {
            limit = { owner = { tag = PER } }
			set_global_flag = persia_accepts_duhamel
		}
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 15
            modifier = {
                factor = 0
                NOT = { relation = { who = RUS value = 150 } }
            }
            modifier = {
                factor = 2
                alliance_with = RUS
            }
            modifier = {
                factor = 2
                in_sphere = RUS
            }
			modifier = {
                factor = 0
                tag = AFG
				has_global_flag = persia_accepts_duhamel
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = RUS
							alliance_with = RUS
						}
						OR = {
							PER = { in_sphere = RUS }
							PER = { alliance_with = RUS }
						}
					}
				}
            }
        }
    }

	option = {
        name = "We refuse."
		RUS = { country_event = { id = 18482067 days = 3 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.75
                NOT = { relation = { who = ENG value = 0 } }
            }
            modifier = {
                factor = 2
                alliance_with = ENG
            }
            modifier = {
                factor = 2
                in_sphere = ENG
            }
        }
    }
}

#### 1904 Roraima Arbitration ####
	country_event = {
        id = 16121919
        title = "The Pirara Question"
        desc = "PIRARAREQUEST"
		picture = "administration"

        is_triggered_only = yes

        option = {
            name = "It's time to end this dispute."
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						ITA = { exists = yes }
						NOT = { exists = SAR }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					ITA = { country_event = { id = 16121920 days = 2 } }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						SAR = { exists = yes }
						NOT = { exists = ITA }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					SAR = { country_event = { id = 16121920 days = 2 } }
				}
			}
			diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = 50 }
			relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 100
            }
        }
		option = {
            name = "Never!"
			diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = -25 }
			relation = { who = FROM value = -25 }
			FROM = { country_event = { id = 16121922 days = 2 } }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 0
            }
        }
	}
	country_event = {
        id = 16121920
        title = "The Pirara Question"
        desc = "ITALYDECIDESPIRARA"
		picture = "administration"

        is_triggered_only = yes

        option = {
            name = "Award the territory to Britain."
			BRZ = { country_event = { id = 16121923 days = 2 } }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 10
            }
        }
		option = {
            name = "Split it between the two."
			ENG = { country_event = { id = 16121924 days = 2 } }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 80
            }
        }
		option = {
            name = "Brazil's claim is legitimate."
			ENG = { country_event = { id = 16121925 days = 2 } }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 10
            }
        }
	}
	country_event = {
        id = 16121922
        title = "Britain refuses"
        desc = "The United Kingdom has informed us that they refuse to relinquish their claims on Pirara, leaving only the method of settlement the field of battle."
		picture = "administration"

        is_triggered_only = yes

        option = {
            name = "The hard way, then."
        }
	}
	country_event = {
        id = 16121923
        title = "The Pirara Question"
        desc = "The British have won the arbitration, and now - rightfully - claim Pirara. Do we oppose the results?"

        is_triggered_only = yes

        option = {
            name = "Unacceptable!"
			diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = -25 }
			relation = { who = FROM value = -25 }

			relation = { who = ENG value = -35 }
			ENG = { country_event = { id = 16121926 days = 2 } }
			830 = {
            add_core = BRZ
            }
			3568 = {
            add_core = BRZ
            }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 0
            }
        }
		option = {
            name = "We must accept."
			ENG = { country_event = { id = 16121927 days = 2 } }
			830 = {
            remove_core = BRZ secede_province = ENG
            }
			3568 = {
            remove_core = BRZ secede_province = ENG
            }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 100
            }
        }
	}
	country_event = {
        id = 16121924
        title = "The Pirara Question"
        desc = "Vittorio Emanuele II has decided to split the disputed territory. Shall we agree to this settlement?"
		picture = "administration"

        is_triggered_only = yes

        option = {
            name = "Unacceptable!"
			diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = -25 }
			relation = { who = FROM value = -25 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = BRZ value = -35 }
			relation = { who = BRZ value = -35 }
			BRZ = { country_event = { id = 16121922 days = 2 } }
			830 = {
            add_core = BRZ
            }
			3568 = {
            add_core = BRZ
            }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 0
            }
        }
		option = {
            name = "We abide by the results."
			3568 = {
            add_core = BRZ secede_province = BRZ
			}
			BRZ = { country_event = { id = 16121928 days = 2 } }
			ai_chance = {
                factor = 100
            }
        }
	}

            add_core = BRZ

            add_core = BRZ
            }

                factor = 0
            }
        }
		option = {
            name = "We abide by the results."
			830 = {
            add_core = BRZ secede_province = BRZ
            }
			3568 = {
            add_core = BRZ secede_province = BRZ
            }
			830 = {
            remove_core = ENG
            }
			3568 = {
            remove_core = ENG
            }

            }
        }
	}

			casus_belli = { target = BRZ type = humiliate_no_infamy months = 36 }
        }
	}

country_event = {
	id = 18482064
	picture = "greece_eighteensixtytwo"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1862
		tag = GRE
		has_country_flag = monarchy_government
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }

	option = {
		name = "Prince Alfred is most popular."
		ENG = { country_event = 18482004 }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "Prince Nicholas of Russia is truly Orthodox."
		RUS = { country_event = 18482008 }
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "JAMEOPTION"
		FRA = { country_event = 18482012 }
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "Prince William of Denmark isn't controversial."
		GRE = { country_event = { id = 18482003 days = 2 } }
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }

		ENG = { country_event = { id = 18482035 days = 2 } }
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							war_with = ENG
							truce_with = ENG
						}
						OR = {
							war_with = RUS
							truce_with = RUS
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
}

			AND = {
				tag = ITA
				OR = {
					ITA = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
					ITA = { ai = yes exists = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		1397 = { owner = { civilized = no } }
		1396 = { owner = { civilized = no } }
		NOT = {
			AUS = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
			AUS = { ai = yes exists = yes }
		}
		NOT = {
			AUB = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
			AUB = { ai = yes exists = yes }
		}
		NOT = {
			KUK = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
			KUK = { ai = yes exists = yes }
		}
		NOT = {
			DNB = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
			DNB = { ai = yes exists = yes }
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 7 }
	option = {
        name = "We accept the purchase. §R(Pay 70,000¤)§W"
		1396 = { secede_province = THIS }
		1397 = { secede_province = THIS }
		treasury = -70000
		set_global_flag = italian_north_borneo_colony
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

	option = {
        name = "What, an inhospitable patch of jungle?"
		random_owned = {
            limit = {
				owner = {
                    OR = {
						AND = {
							OR = {
								NGF = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
								NGF = { ai = yes exists = yes }
							}
						}
						AND = {
							OR = {
								GER = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
								GER = { ai = yes exists = yes }
							}
						}
						AND = {
							OR = {
								GCF = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
								GCF = { ai = yes exists = yes }
							}
						}
                    }

				}
            }
            owner = {
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							tag = NGF
							tag = GCF
						}
						exists = yes
					}
					country_event = 18482096
				}
			}
        }
		random_owned = {
            limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						NGF = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
						NGF = { ai = yes exists = yes }
					}
					NOT = {
						GER = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
						GER = { ai = yes exists = yes }
					}
					NOT = {
						GCF = { ai = no is_sphere_leader_of = SUL exists = yes }
						GCF = { ai = yes exists = yes }
					}
				}
            }
            owner = {
               set_global_flag = germany_cant_nborneo
			}
        }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_global_flag = germany_cant_nborneo
				}
			}
			owner = {
				ENG = { country_event = 18482098 }
			}
        }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
}

			}

				rank = 8
				factor = 1

				factor = 1
			}

    trigger = {
		year = 1887
        tag = HAW
		has_country_modifier = the_merry_monarch
		has_country_flag = merry_monarch
		month = 2
		has_country_flag = monarchy_government
    }

        name = "We accept."

			factor = -2
			ideology = liberal
        }
		scaled_militancy = {
			factor = 8
			ideology = reactionary
        }

			factor = 0
		}
    }

		scaled_militancy = {
			factor = 2
			ideology = liberal
        }
		scaled_militancy = {
			factor = -4
			ideology = reactionary
        }
		set_country_flag = refused_haw_pain_ful

			factor = 1
		}
    }

		civilized = no
		month = 6
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

			military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
			activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons

			add_country_modifier = {
				name = white_rajah
				duration = -1
			}
			set_country_flag = missionary_activity
			capital = 1394
			primary_culture = malay
			add_accepted_culture = yue
			religion = protestant
			government = absolute_monarchy
			3841 = { remove_core = SWK }
			1174 = { remove_core = SWK }
			3872 = { remove_core = SWK }
		}
	}
    option = {
        name = "The rebellion must be quelled! §RDeclare war on Sarawak§W"
		ENG = { country_event = 18482162 }
		1394 = { add_core = SWK secede_province = SWK }
		SWK = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			any_pop = { limit = { type = soldiers } reduce_pop = 1.62 }
		}
		war = {
            target = SWK
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
        }
		SWK = { 1394 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		} }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

	option = {
        name = "For Sarawak! §BPlay as Sarawak§W"
		ENG = { country_event = 18482162 }
		1394 = { add_core = SWK secede_province = SWK }
		SWK = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			any_pop = { limit = { type = soldiers } reduce_pop = 1.62 }
		}
		war = {
            target = SWK
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }

		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
	option = {
        name = "Do nothing."
		prestige = -2
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
}

			factor = 1
		}

		3587 = { secede_province = SWK }

			factor = 0
		}

			}
        }

        name = "Welcome, brothers, to Oregon!"

		3454 = { add_core = UOR secede_province = UOR }

    }

        name = "We cannot risk conflict with Mexico."
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }

					owns = 3613

				}
			}
		}

    }

				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = misri
				}

			}
		}
	}

	id = 18482204
	title = "The Alaska Boundary Dispute"
	desc = "ALASKABOUNDARY"
	picture = "alaska_dispute"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1903
        tag = ENG
		USA = { owns = 2 }
		CAN = { vassal_of = ENG owns = 3597 }
		NOT = { year = 1904 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

	option = {
        name = "Take this to the negotiating table."
		USA = { country_event = 18482207 }
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 90
		}
	}

	option = {
        name = "There is no negotiating our claims."
		2 = { add_core = ENG add_core = CAN }
		3597 = { add_core = ENG add_core = CAN }
		USA = { country_event = 18482206 }
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
		}

	}

	option = {
        name = "Concede the claims, a stretch of Alaskan mountainside isnt worth it."
		relation = { who = USA value = 50 }
		USA = { country_event = 18482205 }
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = 18482215
	title = "The Pig War"
	desc = "THEPIGWAREVENTFORTHEBRITISH"
	picture = "pig_war"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1859
        tag = ENG
		USA = { owns = 78 is_vassal = no }
		3598 = { owner = { vassal_of = THIS } }
		NOT = { war_with = USA }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

	option = {
        name = "Give the Yanks the islands. This isnt worth war over."
		random_country = { limit = { tag = USA owns = 78 } country_event = 18482216 }
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
        name = "Stand strong and approve military action if necessary!"
		USA = { country_event = 18482217 }
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
        name = "Calm the situation down."
		USA = { country_event = 18482218 }
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 90
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = 1849221
	title = "Arbitrating the San Juans Dispute"
	desc = "ARBITRATETHEPIGS"
	picture = "washington_treaty_1871"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = san_juans_will_be_arbitrated
        year = 1871
		tag = ENG
		USA = { owns = 78 }
		OR = {
			3598 = { owner = { vassal_of = THIS } }
			owns = 3598
		}
		NOT = { war_with = USA }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

	option = {
        name = "We can only hope that they will decide in our favor..."
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GER = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				GER = { country_event = 12580286 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GER = { exists = no }
					GCF = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				GCF = { country_event = 12580286 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GER = { exists = no }
					GCF = { exists = no }
					NGF = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				NGF = { country_event = 12580286 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GER = { exists = no }
					GCF = { exists = no }
					NGF = { exists = no }
					AUS = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				AUS = { country_event = 12580286 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GER = { exists = no }
					GCF = { exists = no }
					NGF = { exists = no }
					AUS = { exists = no }
					KUK = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				KUK = { country_event = 12580286 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GER = { exists = no }
					GCF = { exists = no }
					NGF = { exists = no }
					AUS = { exists = no }
					KUK = { exists = no }
					DNB = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				DNB = { country_event = 12580286 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					GER = { exists = no }
					GCF = { exists = no }
					NGF = { exists = no }
					AUS = { exists = no }
					KUK = { exists = no }
					DNB = { exists = no }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				CLN = { country_event = 12580286 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482221
    title = "The Texas Accession"
    desc = "After negotiations with the government of Texas and the overthrow of their unwilling president Sam Houston, the Lone Star State has joined the Confederacy."
	picture = "texas_secedes"
    fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
        name = "Huzzah!"
		TEX = { government = democracy political_reform = universal_voting }
		inherit = TEX
		any_owned = { limit = { is_core = TEX } add_core = THIS }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { CSA = { owns = 135 } } }
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { USA = { owns = 129 } } }
					owner = {
						129 = { secede_province = CSA add_core = CSA }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { CSA = { owns = 136 } } }
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { USA = { owns = 3588 } } }
					owner = {
						3588 = { secede_province = CSA add_core = CSA }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { CSA = { owns = 3588 } } }
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { USA = { owns = 3589 } } }
					owner = {
						3589 = { secede_province = CSA add_core = CSA }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { CSA = { owns = 3588 } } }
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { USA = { owns = 2662 } } }
					owner = {
						2662 = { secede_province = CSA add_core = CSA }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { CSA = { owns = 3589 } } }
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { USA = { owns = 100 } } }
					owner = {
						100 = { secede_province = CSA add_core = CSA }
					}
				}
			}
		}

			limit = { owner = { CSA = { owns = 3589 } } }
			owner = {

country_event = {
    id = 18482234
    title = "Kurasu Esu"
    desc = "KURASUESU"
    picture = "class_s"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1930
		owns = 1676
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

	option = {
		name = "Ban the works."
        any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -1.5
				ideology = fascist
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -1.5
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = conservative
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = radical
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = socialist
            }
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
	}

	option = {
		name = "Allow publishing to continue."
		plurality = 1
        any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = fascist
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = conservative
            }
		}

        ai_chance = {
            factor = 100
        }
	}
}

    desc = "COTOWARINTERVENTIONAGCOS"

	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Back down..."
		end_war = PNM
		PNM = { country_event = 184822712 }
		FROM = { country_event = 184822713 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }

	option = {
        name = "Continue the war at all costs!"
		PNM = { country_event = 184822711 create_alliance = FROM }
		FROM = { country_event = 184822714 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }

}

			}
		}
	}

			}

			}

								province_id = 3684

						}

		}

			owner = {
				TUR = {
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 874
								province_id = 873
								province_id = 921
								province_id = 878
							}
						}
						secede_province = EGY
					} 
				}
			}
		}
		badboy = 3
    }
	option = {
        name = "Such a waste of power."
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482287
    title = "Nicaragua secedes"
    desc = "NICARAGUAAUCA"
    picture = "uca_event"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1838
		tag = UCA
		owns = 2199
		month = 4
		NOT = {
			year = 1840
			has_country_flag = usca_wins
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "There is nothing we can do."
		set_global_flag = uca_gave_up
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = NIC NOT = { province_id = 3659 province_id = 2195 province_id = 2196 } }
			secede_province = NIC
		}
		NIC = { define_general = { name = "José Núñez" personality = defence_minus_1.1 background = attack_minus_2.1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.999
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UCA = { is_vassal = yes }
			}
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "The federation must be defended at all costs! §RDeclare war on Nicaragua§W"
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = small_country_draft
            duration = 1095
        }
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = NIC NOT = { province_id = 3659 province_id = 2195 province_id = 2196 } }
			secede_province = NIC
		}
		war = {
            target = NIC
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
        }
		NIC = {
			define_general = { name = "José Núñez" personality = defence_minus_1.1 background = attack_minus_2.1 }
            add_country_modifier = {
                name = small_country_draft
                duration = 1095
            }
		}
		random_owned = {
            limit = {
                owner = {
					NIC = { is_vassal = yes }
                }
            }
            owner = {
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						NIC = { vassal_of = THIS }
					}
					country_event = 19482287
				}
			}
        }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.001
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				UCA = { is_vassal = yes }
			}
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Viva Nicaragua!"
		set_global_flag = uca_gave_up
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = NIC NOT = { province_id = 3659 province_id = 2195 province_id = 2196 } }
			secede_province = NIC
		}
		NIC = { define_general = { name = "José Núñez" personality = defence_minus_1.1 background = attack_minus_2.1 } }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = NIC
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = uca_gave_up
		year = 1839
		tag = UCA
		owns = 2187
		NOT = {
			year = 1840
			has_country_flag = usca_wins
		}
		OR = {
			AND = { NIC = { war = no owns = 2197 } has_global_flag = overlord_intervenes_uca }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = overlord_intervenes_uca }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "There is nothing we can do."
		end_war = NIC
		end_war = HON
		end_war = COS
		set_global_flag = uca_gave_up
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = LOS }
			secede_province = LOS
		}
		LOS = { define_general = { name = "Agustín Guzmán" personality = defence_1.1 background = attack_1.1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Viva Los Altos!"
		end_war = NIC
		end_war = HON
		end_war = COS
		set_global_flag = uca_gave_up
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = LOS }
			secede_province = LOS
		}
		LOS = { define_general = { name = "Agustín Guzmán" personality = defence_1.1 background = attack_1.1 } }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = LOS
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482291
    title = "Guatemala secedes"
    desc = "GUATEMALAAUCA"
    picture = "uca_event"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1839
		tag = UCA
		owns = 2186
		month = 3
		NOT = {
			year = 1840
			has_country_flag = usca_wins
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = uca_gave_up }
		OR = {
			AND = { NIC = { war = no owns = 2197 } has_global_flag = overlord_intervenes_uca }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = overlord_intervenes_uca }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "There is nothing we can do."
		end_war = NIC
		end_war = HON
		end_war = COS
		end_war = LOS
		set_global_flag = uca_gave_up
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = GUA NOT = { province_id = 2193 province_id = 1918 } }
			secede_province = GUA
		}
		GUA = { define_general = { name = "Rafael Carrera y Turcios" personality = defence_5.1 background = attack_4.1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "The federation must be defended at all costs! §RDeclare war on Guatemala§W"
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = GUA NOT = { province_id = 2193 province_id = 1918 } }
			secede_province = GUA
		}
		war = {
            target = GUA
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
        }
		GUA = {
			define_general = { name = "Rafael Carrera y Turcios" personality = defence_5.1 background = attack_4.1 }
            add_country_modifier = {
                name = small_country_draft
                duration = 1095
            }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Viva Guatemala!"
		end_war = NIC
		end_war = HON
		end_war = COS
		end_war = LOS
		set_global_flag = uca_gave_up
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = GUA NOT = { province_id = 2193 province_id = 1918 } }
			secede_province = GUA
		}
		GUA = { define_general = { name = "Rafael Carrera y Turcios" personality = defence_5.1 background = attack_4.1 } }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = GUA
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 184823021
    title = "The Rudd Concession Succeeds"
    desc = "RUDDSUCCESS"
    picture = "bee_is_the_best_3"
    fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Hurray! §R(Pay 50,000¤)§W"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ai = no
				}
			}
			owner = {
				treasury = -50000
			}
		}
        diplomatic_influence = { who = MAT value = 600 }
        diplomatic_influence = { who = FRN value = 600 }
        diplomatic_influence = { who = ZBW value = 600 }
        relation = { who = MAT value = 100 }
        prestige = 5
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		MAT = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { create_vassal = MAT } }
		MAT = { country_event = 184823022  political_reform = no_slavery }
		set_global_flag = rudd_concession_success
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }
}

		year = 1893
		tag = ENG
		owns = 2087
		owns = 2635

	}

		name = "The time has come to put an end to Matabeleland. §RDeclare war on Mthwakazi§W"

		war = {
            target = MAT
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
        }
		MAT = { country_event = 184823032 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
	}

		name = "We can't afford a conflict with the Ndebele."
		prestige = -15
		release_vassal = MAT
        relation = { who = MAT value = 100 }

        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
	}

country_event = {
    id = 18482304
    title = "The Second Matabele War"
    desc = "SECONDMATABELEWAR"
    picture = "second_matabele_war"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1896
		tag = ENG
		owns = 2087
		owns = 2635
		owns = 2069
		MAT = { exists = no }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "Crush them! §RDeclare war on Mthwakazi§W"
		2069 = { secede_province = MAT }
		war = {
            target = MAT
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_core_state state_province_id = 2071 }
        }
		MAT = {
			2069 = {
				sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
	}
    option = {
		name = "For Matabeleland! §BPlay as the revolt§W"
		2069 = { secede_province = MAT }
		war = {
            target = MAT
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_core_state state_province_id = 2071 }
        }
		MAT = {
			2069 = {
				sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
			}
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MAT
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
	}
    option = {
		name = "We can't afford to fight them."
		release = MAT

country_event = {
    id = 184823054
    title = "Victory in Potchefstroom"
    desc = "VICTORYPOTCHEFSTROOMWHATNOW"
    picture = "pioneer_wagons"
	fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = hecouldgoallthewaytransvaal
		tag = ENG
		TRN = { exists = yes war = no owns = 2105 }
		OR = {
			2108 = { owner = { has_country_modifier = recently_lost_war } }
			2108 = { owned_by = TRN }
		}
		NOT = { year = 1840 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 1
    }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		TRN = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { create_vassal = TRN } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		3945 = { owner = { truce_with = THIS } }
		}} 3945 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = TRN add_core = TRN } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		3969 = { owner = { truce_with = THIS } }
		}} 3969 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = TRN add_core = TRN } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		2109 = { owner = { truce_with = THIS } }
		}} 2109 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = TRN add_core = TRN } }

		2110 = { owner = { truce_with = THIS } }
		}} 2110 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = TRN add_core = TRN } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		3713 = { owner = { truce_with = THIS } }
		}} 3713 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = TRN add_core = TRN } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		2074 = { owner = { truce_with = THIS } }
		}} 2074 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = TRN add_core = TRN } }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = TRN
			}
			secede_province = TRN
		}
        relation = { who = TRN value = 100 }
        TRN = {
            prestige = -30
            add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 1825 }
            government = prov_gov_liberal
			civilized = yes
			set_country_flag = colony_exemption
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }

		TRN = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { create_vassal = TRN } }

			any_owned = {

				secede_province = THIS
			}

			}

country_event = {
    id = 18482306
    title = "The Second Matabele-Rozvi War"
    desc = "DAMNMATABELE2"
    picture = "bee_is_the_best_2"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1866
		tag = MAT
		ZBW = { exists = yes }
		OR = {
			owns = 2070
			owns = 2071
			owns = 2068
			owns = 2110
		}
		NOT = { year = 1869 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "The time has come to end Rozvi once and for all! §RDeclare war on Rozvi§W"
		war = {
            target = ZBW
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			call_ally = no
        }
		ZBW = { any_owned = {
			limit = { province_id = 2070 }
			secede_province = THIS
		} }
		2069 = { add_core = ZBW }
		2635 = { add_core = ZBW }
		2073 = { add_core = ZBW }
		2056 = { add_core = ZBW }
		ZBW = { country_event = 184823061 government = absolute_monarchy }
		prestige = 5
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = all_or_nothing
			duration = 400
		}
		2071 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { has_global_flag = colonial_railroading_disabled } } }
			owner = {
				2069 = { add_core = ZBW remove_core = TSI remove_core = GAZ remove_core = SHO }
				2635 = { add_core = ZBW remove_core = TSI remove_core = GAZ remove_core = SHO }
				2073 = { add_core = ZBW remove_core = TSI remove_core = GAZ remove_core = SHO }

country_event = {
    id = 18482328
    title = "The 1840 Spanish Revolution"
    desc = "1840SPAINREV"
    picture = "1840_spa_rev"
	fire_only_once = yes
	major = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1840
		tag = SPA
		has_country_modifier = regency_government
		has_country_flag = monarchy_government
		month = 4
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "Viva Espartero!"
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = power_vacuum
			duration = 365
		}
		any_pop = { consciousness = 1.5 }
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -3
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = espartero_regency
        clr_country_flag = political_showdown
        clr_country_flag = tory_election_win
        clr_country_flag = socialist_election_win
        set_country_flag = liberal_election_win
        clr_country_flag = communist_election_win
        clr_country_flag = fascist_election_win
        clr_country_flag = reactionary_election_win
        clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_election_win
		ruling_party_ideology = liberal
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 31720
    title = "The Catalan Rebellion of $YEAR$"
    desc = "The Catalans have been seeking independence for decades and have now revolted for the Carlist cause. A rebellion is brewing in Barcelona, and there is more and more violence in the streets."
    picture = "barcelona_bombing_1842"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = espartero_regency
		year = 1842
        tag = SPA
		owns = 498
		NOT = { centralization = federalism }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Bombard Barcelona." #Pauil's nightmare
		any_pop = {
			limit = { location = { region = SPA_498 } }
			ideology = { value = radical factor = 0.1 }
			ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.1 }
		}
        prestige = 1
		498 = {
			add_province_modifier = { name = war_torn duration = 600 }
        }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = catalan }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = radical
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 9
				ideology = liberal
            }
        }
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 80
        }
    }

	option = {
        name = "Call in the military!"
		any_pop = {
			limit = { location = { region = SPA_498 } }
			ideology = { value = radical factor = 0.1 }
			ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.1 }
		}
		498 = {
			add_province_modifier = { name = war_torn duration = 900 }
        }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = catalan }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = radical
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = radical
            }
		}

		ai_chance = {
            factor = 10
        }
    }

	option = {
        name = "Let them be."
		any_pop = {
			limit = { location = { region = SPA_498 } }
			ideology = { value = radical factor = 0.1 }
			ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.1 }
		}
        prestige = -10
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = catalan }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = reactionary
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = liberal
            }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = radical
            }
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = radical
            }
		}
		ai_chance = {
            factor = 10
        }
    }
}

					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				election = yes
			}
		}
	}
