country_event = {
    id = 18482351
    title = "The Pronouncement of Villarejo de Salvanés"
    desc = "VILLAREJOPRONOUNCEMENT"
    picture = "prim_villarejo"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1866
		tag = SPA
		owns = 498
		has_country_flag = monarchy_government
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "A loss for Spanish democracy."
		any_pop = {
			limit = { location = { is_core = SPA continent = europe } }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = radical
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482353
    title = "The Destruction of Fener"
    desc = "FENERADO"
    picture = "fener_ado"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1865
		tag = ADO
		FRA = { exists = yes }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "Ask France for help."
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = 2
			reduce_pop = 0.99
		}
		prestige = -1
		FRA = { country_event = 184823531 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "We don't need their help!"
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = 2
			reduce_pop = 0.985
		}
		prestige = 1
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184823531
    title = "The Destruction of Fener"
    desc = "FENERFRA"
    picture = "fener_ado"
	fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
		name = "What's an Andorra?"
		FRA = { diplomatic_influence = { who = ADO value = -200 } }
		FRA = { relation = { who = ADO value = -200 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "We must assist our Andorran brothers! §R(Pay 4,000¤)§W"
		treasury = -4000
		ADO = { treasury = 4000 }
		FRA = { diplomatic_influence = { who = ADO value = 200 } }
		FRA = { relation = { who = ADO value = 100 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

            target = FRA

        }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "We can do nothing about it..."
		prestige = -5
		set_country_flag = passive_antankarana
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482357
    title = "French Protection?"
    desc = "FRENCHPROTECTIONAKR"
    picture = "nosybemeeting"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1840
		tag = AKR
		has_country_flag = passive_antankarana
		OR = {
			FRA = { owns = 3679 }
			BOR = { owns = 3679 }
		}
		month = 4
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "Why? To get us annexed?! Go away!"
		prestige = 5
		3679 = {
			owner = {
				relation = { who = AKR value = -400 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = AKR value = -400 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Giving in could help us mantain our sovereignty."
		prestige = -5
		3679 = {
			owner = {
				relation = { who = AKR value = 400 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = AKR value = 400 }
				country_event = 184823571
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184823571
    title = "The Meeting on Bourbon"
    desc = "HELLVILLEMEETING"
    picture = "nosybemeeting"
	fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
		name = "A new protectorate? Excellent."
		prestige = 1
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		AKR = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { create_vassal = AKR } }
		3679 = { remove_core = AKR add_core = MAD }
		relation = { who = MAD value = -150 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = 184823572
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "The Antankarana aren't to be trusted."
		relation = { who = MAD value = 50 }
		relation = { who = AKR value = -400 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = AKR value = -400 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = 184823573
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482358
    title = "A Change in Overlord?"
    desc = "Nosy Be has been annexed by another power, and our overlordship has changed to them."
    picture = "antankarana_map"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = AKR
		AKR = { is_vassal = yes overlord = { NOT = { owns = 3679 } } }
		NOT = { owns = 3679 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "Damn...!"
		AKR = {
			overlord = {
				relation = { who = AKR value = -400 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = AKR value = -400 }
				release_vassal = AKR
			}
		}
		3679 = { owner = { country_event = 184823581 } }
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184823581
    title = "Antankarana claims our protection"
    desc = "After our annexation of Nosy Be, the Antankarana Kingdom now claims that we're their overlord."
    picture = "antankarana_map"
	fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
		name = "Huzzah!"
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		AKR = { is_vassal = no }
		}} owner = { create_vassal = AKR } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "No, they are our colony. §RDeclare war on Antankarana§W"
		war = {
            target = AKR
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_core_state state_province_id = 3679 }
        }
		AKR = { country_event = 184823582 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Let them be free."
		AKR = { country_event = 184823583 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 18482359
    title = "The Radical Coup"
    desc = "RADICALCOUP1848FRA"
    picture = "radical_coup_fra"
	fire_only_once = yes
	major = yes

	trigger = {
		owns = 425
		has_country_flag = radical_revolt_possible
		OR = {
			tag = FRA
			tag = BOR
		}
		425 = { any_pop = { militancy = 5 } }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "Vive la révolution!"
		government = radical_republic
		ruling_party_ideology = radical
		any_pop = {
			limit = { OR = { type = aristocrats type = capitalists } }
			reduce_pop = 0.90
		}
		any_pop = {
            ideology = { value = radical factor = 0.2 }
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = -10
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = -10
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 8
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 8
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 10
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 10
			}
		}
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				NOT = { government = democracy government = radical_republic }
            }
            relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
            diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -400 }
        }
		plurality = -20
		social_reform = good_minimum_wage
		social_reform = eight_hours
		social_reform = good_safety
		social_reform = good_subsidies
		social_reform = good_pensions
		social_reform = capital_punishment
		political_reform = harassment
		political_reform = population_equal_weight
		political_reform = mandatory_service
		political_reform = state_controlled
		political_reform = universal_voting
		political_reform = unitary
		political_reform = all_voting_pops
		political_reform = no_meeting
		social_reform = child_labor_restricted
		political_reform = closed_borders
		political_reform = bankruptcy
		political_reform = censored_press
		political_reform = no_slavery
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482368
    title = "The New Orleans Massacre of 1866"
    desc = "NEWORLEANSMASSACRE"
    picture = "neworleans_massacre"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1866
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = has_used_radical_reconstruction
		owns = 139
		month = 7
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }


    option = {
        name = "NEWORLEANSMASSACREOPT"
		any_pop = {
            ideology = { value = radical factor = 0.01 }
            ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.05 }
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 1
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = 1
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 1
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 1
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = afro_american }
			consciousness = 2
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

}

    id = 18482369
    title = "The Newport Rising"
    desc = "NEWPORTRISING"
    picture = "newport_rising"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1839
		tag = ENG
		owns = 273
		month = 10

    option = {
        name = "The ringleaders shall be hung, drawn and quartered."

			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = -8
			}

				ideology = liberal

			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 1
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = 8
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
            ideology = { value = radical factor = 0.02 }
            ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.04 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Commute their sentence to transportation to Tasmania."
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = radical
				factor = 4
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = { factor = 2 issue = universal_voting }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

		year = 1846

    option = {
        name = "Slavery shall be no more!"

		slaves = { militancy = -8 consciousness = -8 }
		any_pop = { consciousness = 1 }
		political_reform = no_slavery
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We cannot risk the irreparable damage to our economy."
		aristocrats = { militancy = -5 consciousness = -8 }
		slaves = { militancy = 2 consciousness = 4 }
		any_pop = { consciousness = -1 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

                    is_core = FIN
				}
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				secede_province = THIS
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				secede_province = RUS
				# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
				add_core = RUS
			}
		}

			factor = 0
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

		has_global_flag = start_angola
		OR = { tag = POR tag = UPB has_country_flag = i_am_upb }
		is_our_vassal = DJK

		year = 1870
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		release_vassal = DJK
		inherit = DJK
		release_vassal = ANG
		inherit = ANG
		DJK = { all_core = { add_core = ANG } }
		2000 = { add_core = ANG }
		POR_2003 = { add_core = ANG }
		POR_2006 = { add_core = ANG }
		POR_1999 = { add_core = ANG }
		POR_2004 = { add_core = ANG }
    }

country_event = {
    id = 184824324
    title = "A Coalition is Created Against Us!"
    desc = "Segu and Gabu have united against us to end our Jihad."
    picture = "jallon_map"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Create a coalition against them!"
		prestige = -3
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		TOO = { is_vassal = no war = no } } } owner = {
		TOO = { country_event = 184824325 } } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		BTE = { is_vassal = no war = no } } } owner = {
		BTE = { country_event = { id = 184824325 days = 1 } } } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		BDU = { is_vassal = no war = no } } } owner = {
		BDU = { country_event = { id = 184824325 days = 3 } } } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		GNE = { is_vassal = no war = no } } } owner = {
		GNE = { country_event = { id = 184824325 days = 4 } } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We can hold both fronts."
		prestige = 3
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184824325
    title = "Form a Jihadi Coalition?"
    desc = "Segu and Gabu have united against Jallon to end our Jihad. Must we help them?"
    picture = "jallon_map"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes

    option = {
        name = "Create a coalition against them!"
		prestige = 3
		create_alliance = JAL
		JAL = { country_event = 184824326 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We can't fight right now."
		prestige = -3
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184824326
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ Joins Us!"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ has agreed to join us in our jihad."
    picture = "jallon_map"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		prestige = 1
		create_alliance = FROM
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		war = { attacker_goal = { casus_belli = call_allies_cb } call_ally = yes }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482432
    title = "Leave the Caliphate?"
    desc = "Our state might deserve independence after all these years of oppression.."
    picture = "adamawa_map"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes


    option = {
        name = "For the liberation of our lands!"
		prestige = 3
		set_global_flag = adamawa_left_us
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				neighbour = THIS
				OR = {
					tag = SOK
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc }
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou }
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = 184824328
		}
		remove_country_modifier = puppet_adamawa
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.2
		}
    }

    option = {
        name = "This is not a good idea."
		prestige = -5
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				neighbour = THIS
				OR = {
					tag = SOK
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc }
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou }
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 100
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.8
		}
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184824328
    title = "Adamawa Leaves Us!"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to wait for the Mahdi alone."
    picture = "adamawa_map"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes

    option = {
        name = "We have to remain united! §RDeclare war on $FROMCOUNTRY$§W"
		casus_belli = {
            target = ADW
            type = make_puppet
            months = 12
        }
		war = {
            target = ADW
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = make_puppet }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
        }
		ADW = { remove_country_modifier = puppet_adamawa }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.2
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "They shall do what they shall."
		ADW = { remove_country_modifier = puppet_adamawa }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.8
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184821328
    title = "Leave the Caliphate?"
    desc = "Our state might deserve independence after all these years of oppression.."
    picture = "adamawa_map"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes

				}
			}

				who = THIS
				value = -100
			}

		}

    desc = "EMIRATEMECHANIC"

		tag = ADW } } owner = {

			name = puppet_adamawa duration = -1
		} } }

		tag = ILO } } owner = {
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = puppet_ilorin duration = -1
		} } }

		tag = KEB } } owner = {
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = puppet_gwandu duration = -1
		} } }

country_event = {
    id = 18482433
    title = "The Death of Modibbo Adama"
    desc = "MODIBBOADAMA"
    picture = "adamawa_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1847
		tag = ADW
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 2 }


    option = {
        name = "We shall mourn."
		prestige = -2
		set_country_flag = prepare_the_guns
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 18482434
    title = "The Death of Lauwal bin Adama"
    desc = "LAUWALADAMADEATH"
    picture = "adamawa_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		tag = ADW
		has_country_flag = found_yola
		has_country_flag = prepare_the_guns
		war = no
		OR = {
			any_neighbor_country = { tag = SOK alliance_with = THIS }
			any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc alliance_with = THIS }
			any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou alliance_with = THIS }
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				OR = {
					AND = { SOK = { prestige = 40 } year = 1850 }
					AND = { SOK = { prestige = 30 } year = 1856 }
					AND = { SOK = { prestige = 20 } year = 1863 }
					AND = { SOK = { prestige = 10 } year = 1871 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou prestige = 40 } year = 1850 }
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou prestige = 30 } year = 1856 }
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou prestige = 20 } year = 1863 }
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou prestige = 10 } year = 1871 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc prestige = 40 } year = 1850 }
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc prestige = 30 } year = 1856 }
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc prestige = 20 } year = 1863 }
					AND = { any_neighbor_country = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc prestige = 10 } year = 1871 }
				}
			}
			year = 1876
		}
		NOT = { year = 1878 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = adamawa_left_us }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }


    option = {
        name = "Oh no..."
		prestige = -5
		any_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = { tag = SOK alliance_with = THIS }
			        AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc alliance_with = THIS }
			        AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou alliance_with = THIS }
				}
			}
			country_event = 184824341
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

}

    id = 184824341
    title = "The Adamawan Succession Crisis"
    desc = "ADAMAWALAMIDO"

country_event = {
    id = 184824343
    title = "Adamawa Revolts!"
    desc = "The Hamidites have refused our election, claiming it is fraudulent, and have started an insurrection in Adamawa."
    picture = "adamawa_map"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Put them down! §R$FROMCOUNTRY$ declares war§W"
		leave_alliance = ADW
		set_global_flag = adamawa_left_us
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ADW = { vassal_of = THIS } } } owner = { release_vassal = ADW } }
		ADW = { war = {
            target = THIS
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
        } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We can do nothing about it."
		leave_alliance = ADW
		set_global_flag = adamawa_left_us
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 184824346
    title = "Hamidu Is Found Dead"
    desc = "HAMIDUDEADHOW"
    picture = "adamawa_map"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Sanda bin Adama is Adamawa's Lamido."
		ADW = { country_event = { id = 184824347 days = 1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "This is an assassination! To war! §RDeclare war on $FROMCOUNTRY$§W"
		leave_alliance = ADW
		set_global_flag = adamawa_left_us
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ADW = { vassal_of = THIS } } } owner = { release_vassal = ADW } }
		war = {
            target = ADW
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
        }
		ADW = { country_event = { id = 184824348 days = 1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 184824351
    title = "Mandara Leaves Us!"
    desc = "Mandara has decided to declare independence from us based upon their new-found military self-reliance."
    picture = "adamawa_map"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes

    option = {
        name = "We have to go united! §R$FROMCOUNTRY$ declares war§W"
		FROM = { war = {
            target = KBO
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
        } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.4
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "They shall do what they shall."
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.6
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482436
    title = "The Alfonso XIII Award"
    desc = "YOULOSTTRUJILLO"
    picture = "uca_event"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "We recognize the award..."
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2195
					province_id = 2196
				}
			}
			secede_province = FROM
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "We refuse."
		2195 = { add_core = THIS add_core = FROM }
		2196 = { add_core = THIS add_core = FROM }
		FROM = { country_event = 184824361 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184824361
    title = "TRUJILLOWHATTITLE"
    desc = "TRUJILLOWHATDESC"
    picture = "uca_event"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "This is a disgrace. §RDeclare war on $FROMCOUNTRY$§W"
		prestige = 2
		war = {
            target = FROM
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
        }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "We cannot go to war."
		prestige = -5
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = NIC } }
			owner = {
				2195 = { remove_core = NIC }
				2196 = { remove_core = NIC }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = HON } }
			owner = {
				2195 = { remove_core = HON }
				2196 = { remove_core = HON }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 184824382
    title = "The Hughes Award"
    desc = "HUGHESAWARDUSA"
    picture = "hughes_award"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Favor Guatemala."
		GUA = { country_event = 184824383 }
		HON = { country_event = { id = 184824384 days = 1 } }
		relation = {
			who = GUA
			value = 50
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				GUA = { ai = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				relation = {
					who = GUA
					value = 100
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Favor Honduras."
		HON = { country_event = 184824383 }
		GUA = { country_event = { id = 184824385 days = 1 } }
		relation = {
			who = HON
			value = 50
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				HON = { ai = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				relation = {
					who = HON
					value = 100
				}
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Decide on a compromise."
		HON = { country_event = 184824386 }
		GUA = { country_event = 184824386 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				HON = { ai = yes }
				GUA = { ai = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 184824384
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ Favors Guatemala"
    desc = "The Americans have favored Guatemala in the arbitration. Should we accept?"
    picture = "hughes_award"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "I guess they have won..."
		relation = {
			who = USA
			value = 50
		}
		relation = {
			who = GUA
			value = 50
		}
		prestige = -2
		2188 = { remove_core = HON }
		2193 = { remove_core = HON }
		1918 = { remove_core = HON }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2188
					province_id = 2193
					province_id = 1918
				}
			}
			secede_province = GUA
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
        name = "This is not fair!"
		relation = {
			who = USA
			value = -50
		}
		relation = {
			who = GUA
			value = -50
		}
		prestige = 5
		GUA = { country_event = 184824381 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 184824386
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ Determines a Compromise"
    desc = "Guatemala will conserve an Atlantic Coast and stop claiming any Honduran territory. Do we accept?"
    picture = "hughes_award"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		relation = {
			who = USA
			value = 50
		}
		prestige = 2
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = HON
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = { limit = { province_id = 2188 } secede_province = GUA }
				2188 = { remove_core = HON }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = GUA
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 2193 province_id = 1918 } } secede_province = HON }
				2193 = { remove_core = GUA }
				1918 = { remove_core = GUA }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
        name = "We won't agree to this!"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = HON
				}
			}
			owner = {
				GUA = { country_event = { id = 184824381 days = 1 } }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = GUA
				}
			}
			owner = {
				HON = { country_event = { id = 184824381 days = 1 } }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184824381
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ Refuses Border Arbitration"
    desc = "The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have refused to settle our border in the name of democracy."
    picture = "uca_event"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Punish them. §RDeclare war on $FROMCOUNTRY$§W"
		war = {
            target = FROM
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
        }
		2188 = { add_core = GUA add_core = HON }
		2193 = { add_core = GUA add_core = HON }
		1918 = { add_core = GUA add_core = HON }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.6
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "We can't go to war right now."
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.4
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482439
    title = "Muhammed Bello's Health Deteriorates"
    desc = "MUHAMMEDBELLOHEALTH"
    picture = "2nd_sokoto_caliph"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1836
		tag = SOK
		owns = 3758
		month = 8
		NOT = { year = 1838 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "We hope he's fine."
		3758 = { change_province_name = "Wurno" }
		capital = 3758
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = regency_modifier
			duration = 500
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

    id = 18482441
    title = "Abu Bakr Atiku Recognizes Adamawa"
    desc = "ATIKUADAMAWA"
    picture = "adamawa_map"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1842
		tag = SOK
		capital = 1948
		ADW = { vassal_of = SOK }
		month = 3
		NOT = { year = 1844 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = sokoto_will_die }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

		set_global_flag = sokoto_will_die
	}

		name = "This shouldn't cause any issues."
		set_global_flag = adamawa_starts
		ADW = { country_event = 184824411 government = theocracy }
		any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = hausa } militancy = 4.5 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

country_event = {
    id = 18482443
    title = "Revolts across the Caliphate"
    desc = "ATIKUWHATHAVEYOUDONE"
    picture = "adamawa_map"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = sokoto_will_die
		year = 1842
		tag = SOK
		OR = {
			owns = 3758
			owns = 3815
		}
		capital = 1948
		month = 7
		NOT = { year = 1844 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }
	
	immediate = { set_global_flag = sokotodied clr_global_flag = sokoto_will_die }

    option = {
		name = "Haram acts will be dealt with swiftly."
		prestige = -2
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = national_instability
            duration = 200
        }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { KEB = { alliance_with = THIS exists = yes } } }
		owner = {
			set_global_flag = gwandu_left_us
			KEB = { remove_country_modifier = puppet_gwandu }
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = DND is_core = KEB }
				secede_province = KEB
			}
			leave_alliance = KEB
			KEB = { war = {
				target = SOK
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
			} }
		} }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 1811
					province_id = 3758
					province_id = 3757
				}
			}
			secede_province = DAM
			add_core = DAM
		}
		release_vassal = DAM
		DAM = { war = {
			target = SOK
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
		} }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184824431
    title = "Gwandu Has Been Pacified"
    desc = "Gwandu has been occupied successfully and we have recovered our lands. What should we do?"
    picture = "adamawa_map"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = sokotodied
		tag = SOK
		KEB = { vassal_of = THIS }
		capital = 1948
		NOT = { year = 1848 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
    option = {
		name = "Return it to an Autonomous Emirate."
		clr_global_flag = gwandu_left_us
		relation = { who = KEB value = 400 }
		create_alliance = KEB
		KEB = { add_country_modifier = {
			name = puppet_gwandu duration = -1
		} }
		KEB = { any_owned = { limit = { NOT = { province_id = 1946 province_id = 3761 } } secede_province = THIS } } 
		any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 1946 province_id = 3761 } } secede_province = KEB }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Make it our vassal."
		3761 = { add_core = SOK }
		1946 = { add_core = SOK }
		KEB = { any_owned = { limit = { NOT = { province_id = 1946 province_id = 3761 } } secede_province = THIS } } 
		any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 1946 province_id = 3761 } } secede_province = KEB }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Annex it. §RGain 3 infamy§W"
		badboy = 3
		KEB = { any_owned = { limit = { NOT = { province_id = 1946 province_id = 3761 } } secede_province = THIS } } 
		inherit = KEB
		inherit = KEB
		3761 = { add_core = SOK }
		1946 = { add_core = SOK }
		KEB = { all_core = { remove_core = KEB } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482444
    title = "Hadejia Revolts"
    desc = "HADEJIAREVOLTS"
    picture = "adamawa_map"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1842
		tag = SOK
		OR = {
			owns = 1947
			owns = 1949
		}
		capital = 1948
		month = 11
		KBO = {
			OR = {
				owns = 1949
				owns = 1951
			}
		}
		NOT = { year = 1844 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = {
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 1949
					province_id = 1951
				}
			}
			secede_province = KBO
			add_core = KBO
		}
	}

    option = {
		name = "Go to war to reclaim it... §RDeclare war on Bornu§W"
		prestige = 5
		KBO = { country_event = 184824441 }
		war = {
			target = KBO
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_any_state
				state_province_id = 1947
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_any_state
				state_province_id = 3756
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Try to do this peacefully."
		KBO = { country_event = 184824442 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

    desc = "ATIKUDEAD"

	trigger = {
		year = 1842
		tag = SOK
		alliance_with = ADW
		capital = 1948
		month = 8
		NOT = { year = 1844 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "And now to quell its mistakes..."

        }

			factor = 0.05
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482457
    title = "The Tswana Migrations"
    desc = "The Tswana, in spite of heightened tensions with the arrival of the Boers and Nguni raids, have started migrating westwards."
    picture = "makololo"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	major = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1841
		owns = 2574
		month = 2
		NOT = { year = 1846 }
		2107 = { NOT = { owner = { primary_culture = tswana } owner = { accepted_culture = khoisan } } }
		2101 = { NOT = { owner = { primary_culture = tswana }  owner = { accepted_culture = khoisan } } }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "The Difaqane continues..."
		any_country = { limit = { owns = 2074 }
			2074 = {
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana }
					reduce_pop = 0.75
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = sotho }
					reduce_pop = 1.9
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = { limit = { owns = 3969 }
			3969 = {
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana }
					reduce_pop = 0.3
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = sotho }
					reduce_pop = 1.2
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = nguni }
					reduce_pop = 1.2
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = { limit = { owns = 2107 }
			2107 = {
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana }
					reduce_pop = 0.6
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = sotho }
					reduce_pop = 2.1
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = { limit = { owns = 2106 }
			2106 = {
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana }
					reduce_pop = 0.75
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = sotho }
					reduce_pop = 1.3
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = { limit = { owns = 2574 }
			2574 = {
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana NOT = { type = soldiers } }
					reduce_pop = 2
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana type = soldiers }
					reduce_pop = 11
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = { limit = { owns = 2075 }
			2075 = {
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana NOT = { type = soldiers } }
					reduce_pop = 2
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana type = soldiers }
					reduce_pop = 11
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = { limit = { owns = 2076 }
			2076 = {

					reduce_pop = 2
				}
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = tswana type = soldiers }
					reduce_pop = 11
				}
			}
		}

					reduce_pop = 1.6
				}
			}

			2094 = {

				}

country_event = {
    id = 18482458
    title = "The Great Zarma Revolt"
    desc = "The Songhai have revolted all over our west, and are menacing our lands to their south. Should we retaliate?"
    picture = "songhai_revolt"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1862
		capital = 1948
		OR = {
			tag = SOK
			has_country_flag = i_became_tou
			has_country_flag = i_am_flc
		}
		OR = {
			1808 = { owned_by = THIS }
			AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 1808 } }
			AND = { KEB = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 1808 } }
			3805 = { owned_by = THIS }
			AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3805 } }
			AND = { KEB = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3805 } }
			3762 = { owned_by = THIS }
			AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3762 } }
			AND = { KEB = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3762 } }
			3812 = { owned_by = THIS }
			AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3812 } }
			AND = { KEB = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3812 } }
			3815 = { owned_by = THIS }
			AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3815 } }
			AND = { KEB = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3815 } }
		}
		OR = {
			DND = { vassal_of = THIS }
			DND = { is_vassal = no }
		}
		month = 7
		NOT = { year = 1865 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "Stop them!"
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
			DND = { vassal_of = THIS }
		} }
		owner = {
			release_vassal = DND
		} }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
			OR = {
				1808 = { owned_by = THIS }
				AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 1808 } }
				AND = { KEB = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 1808 } }
			}
		} }

			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT

		} }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
			OR = {
				3805 = { owned_by = THIS }
				AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3805 } }
				AND = { KEB = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3805 } }
			}
		} }
		owner = {
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			3805 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = DND }
		} }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
			OR = {

				AND = { NIG = { vassal_of = THIS owns = 3762 } }

    id = 18482460
    title = "The Revolt of Qu'aiti"
    desc = "Qu'aiti has seceded from our state, annexing more than 60% of our territory to them."
    picture = "arab_revolt"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1854
		tag = KTH
		owns = 1173
		month = 5
		MLN = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = sw_set }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "We should flee, and fast!"
		MLN = {
			all_core = { remove_core = MLN }

			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish

                    activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
                    set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons

country_event = {
    id = 35325999
    title = "The Nxamasere Massacre"
    desc = "A party of Tswana have burned down multiple of our towns, and the local Herero have taken the oportunity to raid our towns and commit massacres."
    picture = "makololo"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1840
		tag = STP
		owns = 3649
		government = absolute_empire
		NOT = { owns = 2082 owns = 2076 owns = 3717 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "It's over."
		3649 = { secede_province = --- }
		CLN = { country_event = 54665429 }
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184824651
    title = "The Makololo Conquest of the baTawana"
    desc = "The Makololo are launching raids against our state to create a new state. Should we surrender?"
    picture = "makololo"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Surrender..."
		prestige = -5
		end_war = STP
		change_tag_no_core_switch = STP
		STP = { country_event = { id = 184824657 days = 2 } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Fight!"
		prestige = 5
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184824657
    title = "The Conquest of the baTawana"
    desc = "We have been successful in our conquest of baTawana."
    picture = "makololo"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = invadebatawanamkll
		tag = STP
		owns = 3649
		owns = 2076
		government = absolute_empire
		has_global_flag = eighteenthirty_startdate
		NOT = { year = 1839 }
		war = no
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		inherit = TSW
		change_tag = TSW
		clr_global_flag = invadebatawanamkll
		government = theocracy
		1954 = { add_core = STP }
		STP = {
			capital = 1954
			primary_culture = fang
			add_accepted_culture = tiv
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
			remove_accepted_culture = tswana
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
			remove_accepted_culture = herero
			remove_accepted_culture = khoisan
			government = colonial_company_4
			set_country_flag = post_colonial_country
			military_reform = yes_foreign_training
			military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
			activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
			military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
            activate_technology = military_staff_system
			military_reform = yes_foreign_artillery
			activate_technology = bronze_muzzle_loaded_artillery
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_artillery
			add_country_modifier = { name = western_presence duration = -1 }
			tech_school = unciv_tech_school
		}
		set_global_flag = makololotswana
		3649 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sotho
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.00
		} }
		2076 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sotho
			}
			reduce_pop = 11
		} add_province_modifier = { name = missionary_activity_prov duration = -1 } }
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		3649 = {
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			secede_province = ---
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 54665429 }
    }

}

	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
		name = "Great!"
		3649 = { secede_province = THIS }
		3649 = { secede_province = --- }
		3649 = { secede_province = THIS }
		3649 = { secede_province = --- }
	}

}
country_event = {
    id = 18482465
    title = "Victory Against the Makololo!"
    desc = "We have been successful in our battles against the Makololo."
    picture = "makololo"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = invadebatawanamkll
		tag = TSW
		owns = 2076
		has_global_flag = eighteenthirty_startdate
		NOT = { government = theocracy }
		NOT = { year = 1839 }
		war = no
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		1954 = { add_core = STP }
		STP = {
			government = colonial_company_4
			capital = 1954
			primary_culture = fang
			add_accepted_culture = tiv
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
			remove_accepted_culture = tswana
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
			set_country_flag = post_colonial_country
			military_reform = yes_foreign_training
			military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
			activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
			military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
            activate_technology = military_staff_system
			military_reform = yes_foreign_artillery
			activate_technology = bronze_muzzle_loaded_artillery
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_artillery
			add_country_modifier = { name = western_presence duration = -1 }
			tech_school = unciv_tech_school
		}
		# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
		3649 = {
			# Audax Validator "." Ignore_NEXT
			secede_province = ---
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 54665429 }
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 18482466
    title = "The Conquest of the Lozi"
    desc = "We have been successful in our conquest of the Lozi."
    picture = "loxi_king"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = makolololozi
		tag = TSW
		owns = 2081
		owns = 2076
		government = theocracy
		NOT = { year = 1846 }
		ZAM = { exists = no }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		clr_global_flag = makololotswana
		clr_global_flag = makolololozi
		set_global_flag = makolololozifr
		change_tag = ZAM
		government = absolute_monarchy
			add_accepted_culture = chokwe
			add_accepted_culture = luba
		TSW = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			primary_culture = tswana
			add_accepted_culture = herero
			add_accepted_culture = khoisan
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
		}
		2076 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sotho
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.00
		} }
		693 = { secede_province = THIS }
		primary_culture = luvale
		2015 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
				pop_type = slaves
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 2015
		} }

		2013 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
				pop_type = farmers
			}
			pop_type = slaves
		} }
		3722 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
				pop_type = farmers
			}
			pop_type = slaves
		} }
		3726 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
				pop_type = farmers
			}
			pop_type = slaves
		} }
		2013 = { secede_province = CLN }
		2013 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
				pop_type = artisans
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 2013
		} }
		2013 = { secede_province = THIS }
		3722 = { secede_province = CLN }
		3722 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
				pop_type = artisans
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 3722
		} }
		3722 = { secede_province = THIS }
		3726 = { secede_province = CLN }
		3726 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe

			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }
		693 = { any_pop = {

		3726 = { secede_province = THIS }
		
		2013 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = luvale
				pop_type = artisans
			}
			pop_type = farmers
		} }
		3722 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {

			}
			pop_type = farmers
		} }		
		2013 = { secede_province = CLN }

			}

		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }

			move_pop = 2013
		} }

		3722 = { secede_province = CLN }

			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
				NOT = { pop_type = farmers }
				NOT = { pop_type = slaves }
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 3722
		} }

			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe

			move_pop = 3726

		2013 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {

			}

		3722 = { any_pop = {

		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 2081
		} }

			limit = {
				pop_type = slaves
				NOT = { has_pop_culture = khoisan has_pop_culture = herero }
			}
			pop_type = farmers
		} }
		3726 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = botatwe
					has_pop_culture = herero
				}
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 3726
		} }
		3726 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 3726
		} }
		3717 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = botatwe
					has_pop_culture = herero
				}
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 3717
		} }
		3717 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = botatwe
			}
			move_pop = 693
		} }
		693 = { assimilate = yes }
		693 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 3717
		} }
		693 = { secede_province = --- }
		3086 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 2013
		} }
		3087 = { any_pop = {
			move_pop = 3722
		} }
		CLN = { country_event = 54665427 }
		capital = 2081
    }

country_event = {
    id = 52233452
    title = "The Conquest of the baMangwato"
    desc = "We have been successful in our conquest of the baMangwato."
    picture = "loxi_king"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		tag = STP
		owns = 2574
		primary_culture = sotho
		NOT = { year = 1834 }
		BMW = { exists = no }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		change_tag = BMW
		government = absolute_empire
			add_accepted_culture = tswana
		1954 = { add_core = STP }
		STP = {
			capital = 1954
			primary_culture = fang
			add_accepted_culture = tiv
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
			remove_accepted_culture = tswana
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
			remove_accepted_culture = herero
			remove_accepted_culture = khoisan
			government = colonial_company_4
			set_country_flag = post_colonial_country
			military_reform = yes_foreign_training
			military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
			activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
			military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
            activate_technology = military_staff_system
			military_reform = yes_foreign_artillery
			activate_technology = bronze_muzzle_loaded_artillery
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_artillery
			add_country_modifier = { name = western_presence duration = -1 }
			tech_school = unciv_tech_school
		}
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184824662
    title = "The Makololo Fail"
    desc = "We have been successful in our war against the Makololo."
    picture = "loxi_king"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = makolololozi
		tag = ZAM
		owns = 2013
		government = absolute_empire
		NOT = { year = 1846 }
		TSW = { exists = yes is_disarmed = yes }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		clr_global_flag = makolololozi
		clr_global_flag = makololotswana
		TSW = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			primary_culture = tswana
			add_accepted_culture = herero
			add_accepted_culture = khoisan
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
		}
		inherit = TSW
		any_owned = { limit = { province_id = 2076 } secede_province = TSW add_province_modifier = { name = missionary_activity_prov duration = -1 } }
		any_owned = { limit = { province_id = 2075 } secede_province = TSW }
		any_owned = { limit = { province_id = 3715 } secede_province = TSW }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Annex baTawana for ourselves. §RGain 5 infamy§W"
		clr_global_flag = makolololozi
		clr_global_flag = makololotswana
		TSW = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			primary_culture = tswana
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
		}
		inherit = TSW
		badboy = 5
		2076 = { add_province_modifier = { name = missionary_activity_prov duration = -1 } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184824661
    title = "The Makololo Invade Us"
    desc = "The Makololo have started raiding our south and want to claim our throne."
    picture = "dahomey_blockade"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Damn..."
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2081
					province_id = 3717
				}
			}
			secede_province = TSW
		}
		TSW = { 2081 = {
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		} }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482467
    title = "The baTawana Revolt"
    desc = "We have won the war, but the baTawana refuse being under our rule. baTawana is worthless and underpopulated, should we keep it?"
    picture = "zulu"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1845
		owns = 2081
		owns = 2076
		primary_culture = sotho
		OR = {
			AND = { tag = ZAM TSW = { exists = no } }
			tag = TSW
		}
		NOT = { year = 1854 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }

    option = {
        name = "Let them gain independence."
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = ZAM
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = { limit = { OR = {
						province_id = 2075
						province_id = 2076
						province_id = 3715
					} }
					secede_province = TSW
					add_core = TSW
					remove_core = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = TSW
				}
			}
			owner = {
				government = absolute_monarchy
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ai = yes
					war_with = ZAM
				}
			}
			owner = {
				end_war = ZAM
			}
		}
		TSW = {
			primary_culture = tswana
			add_accepted_culture = herero
			add_accepted_culture = khoisan
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
		}
		2076 = { add_province_modifier = { name = missionary_activity_prov duration = -1 } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "For the baTawana! §BPlay as baTawana§W"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = ZAM
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = { limit = { OR = {
						province_id = 2075
						province_id = 2076
						province_id = 3715
					} }
					secede_province = TSW
					add_core = TSW
					remove_core = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = TSW
				}
			}
			owner = {
				government = absolute_monarchy
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ai = yes
					war_with = ZAM
				}
			}
			owner = {
				end_war = ZAM
			}
		}
		TSW = {
			primary_culture = tswana
			add_accepted_culture = herero
			add_accepted_culture = khoisan
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
		}
		2076 = { add_province_modifier = { name = missionary_activity_prov duration = -1 } }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = TSW
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "They are ours! §RGain 5 infamy§W"
		badboy = 5
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = ZAM
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = { limit = { OR = {
						province_id = 2075
						province_id = 2076
						province_id = 3715
					} }
					secede_province = TSW
					add_core = TSW
					remove_core = THIS
				}
				war = {
					target = TSW
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
					call_ally = no
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = TSW
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_pop = { limit = { OR = { has_pop_culture = tswana has_pop_culture = herero } } militancy = 10 }
			}
		}
		TSW = {
			primary_culture = tswana
			add_accepted_culture = herero
			add_accepted_culture = khoisan
			remove_accepted_culture = sotho
			remove_accepted_culture = luvale
		}
		2076 = { add_province_modifier = { name = missionary_activity_prov duration = -1 } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 18482470
    title = "Yusuf Khoja flees to Kokand"
    desc = "KHOJADEFEAT"
    picture = "qihezhuo_rebellion"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		tag = QNG
		NOT = { year = 1836 }
		XIN = { exists = no }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		XIN = { government = colonial_company }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }

country_event = {
    id = 18482475
    title = "The Senussi Movement is Founded"
    desc = "SENUSSICREATION"
    picture = "senussi_on_the_march"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1843
		owns = 1736
		CYR = { exists = no }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = { CYR = { government = absolute_monarchy } }

    option = {
        name = "Oh no..."
		CYR = {
			all_core = { remove_core = CYR }
			capital = 1735
			primary_culture = maghrebi
			add_accepted_culture = bedouin
			add_accepted_culture = teda
			add_accepted_culture = berber
			add_accepted_culture = tuareg
			military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
			activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
			remove_accepted_culture = nupoid
			remove_accepted_culture = yoruba
			remove_accepted_culture = hausa
			remove_accepted_culture = east_kwa
		}
		1735 = { add_core = CYR }
		1736 = { add_core = CYR }
		1737 = { add_core = CYR }
		1738 = { add_core = CYR }
		1742 = { add_core = CYR }
		1754 = { add_core = CYR }
		1758 = { add_core = CYR }
		1817 = { add_core = CYR }
		2564 = { add_core = CYR }
		3687 = { add_core = CYR }
		3686 = { add_core = CYR }
		1753 = { add_core = CYR }
		2585 = { add_core = CYR }
		3868 = { add_core = CYR }
		1752 = { add_core = CYR }
		CYR = { all_core = { remove_core = TRI } }
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 18482476
    title = "The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Claim on Western Sahara"
    desc = "We own lands that are claimed by $FROMCOUNTRY$ founded in talks with the rest of the colonial nations in Africa. Should we accept to cede them?"
    picture = "senussi_on_the_march"

    fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "We have to cede the territories..."
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3833
					province_id = 1696
					province_id = 3682
				}
			}
			secede_province = UTI
		}
		FROM = { inherit = UTI }
		UTI = { all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We should not cede those lands."
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184824761
    title = "The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Claim on Western Sahara"
    desc = "We own lands that are claimed by $FROMCOUNTRY$. It is clearly part of the Europeans' colonization of the territories of the region."
    picture = "senussi_on_the_march"

    fire_only_once = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "We will cede the territories..."
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3833
					province_id = 1696
					province_id = 3682
				}
			}
			secede_province = UTI
		}
		FROM = { inherit = UTI }
		UTI = { all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }
		FROM = { diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = 200 } }
		any_country = { limit = { vassal_of = THIS }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 3833
						province_id = 1696
						province_id = 3682
					}
				}
				secede_province = THIS
				secede_province = UTI
			}
			FROM = { inherit = UTI }
			UTI = { all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We should not cede those lands."
		prestige = 5
		FROM = { diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -200 } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }

}

		owns = 3822
		civilized = yes

            capital_scope = { continent = africa }

            capital_scope = { continent = central_africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = east_africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = south_africa }
        }
		NOT = { owns = 1970 }
		war = no
		NOT = { has_global_flag = colonial_railroading_disabled }
		1970 = { owner = { war = no civilized = yes NOT = { capital_scope = { continent = africa } capital_scope = { continent = west_africa } capital_scope = { continent = central_africa } capital_scope = { continent = east_africa } capital_scope = { continent = south_africa } } } }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Formalize them! (Cede Birao) §GLose 0.5 infamy§W"
		badboy = -0.5
		1970 = { owner = { country_event = 184824801 } }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }

    option = {
        name = "This is not in our interest."
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

    }
    option = {
        name = "We won't let them get away with this! §RDeclare war on $FROMCOUNTRY$§W"
        prestige = 5
        relation = {
            who = FROM
            value = -200
        }
        war = {
            target = FROM
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
            call_ally = no
        }
		set_global_flag = boersnoutrecht
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482495
    title = "The Dervish Movement"
    desc = "DERVISHMOVEMENT"
    picture = "dervishes"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1879
		owns = 1872
		civilized = yes
		3937 = { empty = no NOT = { owned_by = THIS } NOT = { owner = { primary_culture = somali } } }
		3706 = { owner = { NOT = { tag = THIS } } NOT = { owner = { primary_culture = somali } } }
		1867 = { empty = yes }
		1873 = { empty = yes }
		3708 = { empty = yes }
		MAJ = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1890 }
		NOT = { primary_culture = somali }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = historical_dervish has_global_flag = ahistorical_dervish has_global_flag = inahistorical_dervish has_global_flag = bruh_dervish }
    }

	immediate = { set_global_flag = historical_dervish }

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "To war! §RDeclare war on the Dervish§W"
		set_country_flag = you_went_to_dervish
		MAJ = { all_core = { remove_core = MAJ add_core = SOM } }
		1867 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = ETH life_rating = 21 }
		1873 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		3708 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3820 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3820 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
			}
		}
		MAJ = { government = theocracy set_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
		any_owned = { limit = { province_id = 1872 } secede_province = MAJ change_controller = THIS }
		MAJ = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				type = soldiers
			}
			reduce_pop = 1.6
		} }
		1867 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MAJ = { civilized = no }
				}
			}
			owner = { MAJ = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			} }
		}
        war = {
            target = MAJ
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = dervish_cb }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
            call_ally = no
        }
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 1848249531 days = 300 } }
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 1848249541 days = 1000 } }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "It is not worth it to fight."
		MAJ = { all_core = { remove_core = MAJ add_core = SOM } }
		1867 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		1873 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		3708 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3820 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3820 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
			}
		}
		MAJ = { government = theocracy set_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
		MAJ = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				type = soldiers
			}
			reduce_pop = 1.6
		} }
		1867 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MAJ = { civilized = no }
				}
			}
			owner = { MAJ = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			} }
		}
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 1848249531 days = 300 } }
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 1848249541 days = 1000 } }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "For the liberation of Somalia! §BPlay as the Dervish§W"
		MAJ = { all_core = { remove_core = MAJ add_core = SOM } }
		1867 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		1873 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		3708 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3820 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3820 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
			}
		}
		MAJ = { government = theocracy set_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
		MAJ = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				type = soldiers
			}
			reduce_pop = 1.6
		} }
		1867 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}

			limit = {

					MAJ = { civilized = no }

			}
			owner = { MAJ = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			} }
		}
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 1848249531 days = 300 } }
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 1848249541 days = 1000 } }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MAJ
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }

			owner = { MAJ = {
				any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 1867 } } secede_province = THIS }
			} }
		}

		}

			} }

			limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = inahistorical_dervish has_country_flag = you_went_to_dervish_somaliland } }

			} }
		}

				all_core = { remove_core = MAJ }
			} }
		}
    }

			}

    }

country_event = {
    id = 184824961
    title = "The Dervish Movement"
    desc = "DERVISHMOVEMENT"
    picture = "dervishes"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1879
		civilized = yes
		owns = 1872
		owns = 3706
		3937 = { empty = no NOT = { owned_by = THIS } NOT = { owner = { primary_culture = somali } } }
		1867 = { empty = yes }
		1873 = { empty = yes }
		3708 = { empty = yes }
		MAJ = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1890 }
		NOT = { primary_culture = somali }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = historical_dervish has_global_flag = ahistorical_dervish has_global_flag = inahistorical_dervish has_global_flag = bruh_dervish }
    }

	immediate = { set_global_flag = ahistorical_dervish }

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "To war! §RDeclare war on the Dervish§W"
		set_country_flag = you_went_to_dervish
		MAJ = { all_core = { remove_core = MAJ add_core = SOM } }
		1867 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ add_core = ETH life_rating = 21 }
		1873 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		3708 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3820 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3820 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
			}
		}
		MAJ = { government = theocracy set_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
		any_owned = { limit = { province_id = 1872 } secede_province = MAJ change_controller = THIS }
		MAJ = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				type = soldiers
			}
			reduce_pop = 1.6
		} }
		1867 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MAJ = { civilized = no }
				}
			}
			owner = { MAJ = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			} }
		}
		3870 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1864 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1866 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1865 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3590 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1867 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3937 = { add_core = MAJ }
		2031 = { add_core = MAJ }
		2032 = { add_core = MAJ }
		2030 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3850 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3707 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1873 = { add_core = MAJ }
        war = {
            target = MAJ
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = dervish_cb }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
            call_ally = no
        }
		CLN = { country_event = { id = 184824962 days = 300 } }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }

			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }

			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MAJ = { civilized = no }
				}
			}
			owner = { MAJ = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			} }
		}
		3870 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1864 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1866 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1865 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3590 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1867 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3937 = { add_core = MAJ }
		2031 = { add_core = MAJ }
		2032 = { add_core = MAJ }
		2030 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3850 = { add_core = MAJ }
		3707 = { add_core = MAJ }
		1873 = { add_core = MAJ }
        war = {
            target = MAJ
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = dervish_cb }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
            call_ally = no
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "It is not worth it to fight."
		MAJ = { all_core = { remove_core = MAJ add_core = SOM } }
		1867 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		1873 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		3708 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3820 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3820 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = MAJ add_core = MAJ life_rating = 21 }
			}
		}

			limit = {
				type = soldiers
			}

		} }

country_event = {
    id = 18482496
    title = "We Have Won Against Tripolitania!"
    desc = "We have defeated the Tripolitanian rebels and we can now establish a vilayet in its place, as the South is still too unstable for direct rule."
    picture = "senussi_on_the_march"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ottoman_invasion_tripoli
		tag = TUR
		owns = 1744
		owns = 1741
		TRI = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1843 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = { set_global_flag = tripoli_lost }

    option = {
        name = "Let the Fezzan rule itself. (Merge the formed brigades)"
		prestige = 5
		set_country_flag = ruler_good_tur
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3842
					province_id = 1744
					province_id = 1741
					province_id = 3668
				}
			}
			secede_province = TRI
		}
		create_vassal = TRI
		TRI = { government = theocracy }
		1741 = {
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "It's better to rule it directly. §RDeclare war on Tripoli§W"
		prestige = 5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3842
					province_id = 1744
					province_id = 1741
					province_id = 3668
				}
			}
			secede_province = TRI
		}
		TRI = { government = theocracy }
        war = {
            target = TRI
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
            call_ally = no
        }
		1741 = {
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 18482497
    title = "Ghuma's Revolt"
    desc = "GHUMAONE"
    picture = "senussi_on_the_march"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = tripoli_lost
		year = 1843
		tag = TUR
		owns = 1731
		NOT = { has_country_flag = ruler_good_tur }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = fast_path_algeria }
		NOT = { year = 1847 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
    option = {
        name = "To war! §RDeclare war on Tripoli§W"
		prestige = 5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3842
					province_id = 1744
					province_id = 1741
					province_id = 3668
				}
			}
			secede_province = TRI
		}
		TRI = { government = theocracy }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { TRI = { vassal_of = THIS } } } owner = { release_vassal = TRI } }
        war = {
            target = TRI
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
            call_ally = no
        }
		set_global_flag = yes_ghuma
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Restore Tripolitania as a protectorate."
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = TRI
			}
			secede_province = TRI
		}
		create_vassal = TRI
		TRI = { government = absolute_empire }
		set_global_flag = no_more_ghuma
		clr_global_flag = ottoman_invasion_tripoli
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 184824988
    title = "Leave the Sokoto Caliphate?"
    desc = "Our state might deserve independence after all these years of oppression.."
    picture = "adamawa_map"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes


    option = {
        name = "For the liberation of our lands!"
		prestige = 3
		set_global_flag = ilorin_left_us
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				neighbour = THIS
				OR = {
					tag = SOK
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc }
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou }
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = 184824989
		}
		remove_country_modifier = puppet_ilorin
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.2
		}
    }

    option = {
        name = "This is not a good idea."
		prestige = -5
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				neighbour = THIS
				OR = {
					tag = SOK
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_am_flc }
					AND = { owns = 1948 has_country_flag = i_became_tou }
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 100
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.8
		}
    }

}

    picture = "senussi_on_the_march"

    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Go on!"
		prestige = 5
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Cede Laqiya Arba'in..."
		end_war = FROM
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2564
					province_id = 3868
					province_id = 1817
				}
			}
			secede_province = UTI
			add_core = SUD
		}
		FROM = { inherit = UTI }
		UTI = { all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }
		FROM = { country_event = 184825032 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482504
    title = "The Sarra Triangle"
    desc = "Though the barren Sarra Triangle is a part of Libya, it is currently controlled by another power. Should we offer to purchase it?"
    picture = "senussi_on_the_march"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		owns = 2585
		civilized = yes
		money = 100000
		3868 = { owner = { civilized = yes NOT = { tag = THIS } } }
		OR = {
			year = 1930
			mass_politics = 1
		}
		war = no
		NOT = { 2585 = { is_core = THIS } }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "We should see if it's for sale."
		3868 = { owner = { country_event = 184825041 } }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "That patch of desert is absolutely worthless."
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 0
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 184825051
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ Claims Jubaland!"
    desc = "JUBALANDPSYCHOLOGICALTORTURE"
    picture = "jubaland_border"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Cede Jubaland..."
		prestige = -10
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = 75
		}
		3711 = { secede_province = FROM }
		2045 = { secede_province = FROM }
		1870 = { secede_province = FROM }
		FROM = { country_event = 184825052 }
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.90
            modifier = {
                factor = 2
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.5 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 1.25
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.75 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.75
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.5
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1.5 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.25
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 2 }
			}
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Jubaland is $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and it will remain part of $COUNTRY$!"
		prestige = 10
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -100
		}
		FROM = { country_event = 184825053 }
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.10
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.5
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.5 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.75
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.75 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 1.25
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 1.5
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1.5 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 2
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 2 }
			}
		}
    }
}

				AND = { any_greater_power = { truce_with = THIS truce_with = FRA } owner = { tag = FRA } }

				AND = { any_greater_power = { truce_with = THIS truce_with = DEN } owner = { tag = DEN } }
				AND = { any_greater_power = { truce_with = THIS truce_with = SWE } owner = { tag = SWE } }

			}
		}
		#######
        NOT = {
            capital_scope = { continent = africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = west_africa }
            capital_scope = { continent = central_africa }

            capital_scope = { continent = south_africa }
        }
		NOT = { owns = 3394 }

		badboy = 1
		prestige = -5
		3394 = { owner = { country_event = 184825061 } }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }

    option = {
        name = "We don't need to do such a thing."
		prestige = 5
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

			value = 75
		}

		3395 = { secede_province = FROM }
		FROM = { country_event = 184825062 }
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.90
            modifier = {
                factor = 2
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.5 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 1.25
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.75 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.75
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.5
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1.5 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.25
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 2 }
			}
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Anai and Angram are $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and will remain part of $COUNTRY$!"
		prestige = 10
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -100
		}
		FROM = { country_event = 184825063 }
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.10
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.5
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.5 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 0.75
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 0.75 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 1.25
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1 }
			}
            modifier = {
                factor = 1.5
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1.5 }
			}

				FROM = { brigades_compare = 2 }
