country_event = {
    id = 18482508
    title = "The Darfur Rebellion"
    desc = "The Darfuri Emir, Ali Dinar, has revolted against us after major setbacks in other local revolts. We have lost control over most the region."
    picture = "arab_revolt"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1883
		tag = SUD
		owns = 1842
		month = 8
		DAR = { exists = no }
		EGY = { has_country_flag = darfur_warred }
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = famine_sudan
			AND = { year = 1884 war = yes }
		}
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "They should go back to their rump state."
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3702
					province_id = 1817
					province_id = 1838
					province_id = 1842
					province_id = 1841
					province_id = 3821
					province_id = 3822
				}
			}
			secede_province = DAR
		}
        war = {
            target = DAR
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
            call_ally = no
        }
		DAR = { capital_scope = {
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		} }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "For Darfur! §BPlay as Darfur§W"
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3702
					province_id = 1817
					province_id = 1838
					province_id = 1842
					province_id = 1841
					province_id = 3821
					province_id = 3822
				}
			}
			secede_province = DAR
		}
        war = {
            target = DAR
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
            call_ally = no
        }
		DAR = { capital_scope = {
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
		} }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = DAR
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 18482512
    title = "The Gazan Succession Crisis"
    desc = "Our King has died and Mzila and Mawewe, his two sons, have both claimed the throne. Our Empire has been divided, and a war will unite it back."
    picture = "soshangane"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1861
		tag = GAZ
		owns = 3677
		TSI = { exists = no }
		civilized = no
		NOT = { year = 1864 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 2 }

    option = {
        name = "To war!"
		prestige = -5
		TSI = {
			all_core = { remove_core = TSI }
			primary_culture = nguni
			add_accepted_culture = tonga
			add_accepted_culture = southern_bantu
			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish
			government = absolute_monarchy
                    activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
                    set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 398493284 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { flintlock_rifles = 1 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3677
					province_id = 2051
					province_id = 2052
					province_id = 2057
					province_id = 3884
					province_id = 2073
					province_id = 3714
					province_id = 2056
					province_id = 2058
					province_id = 3803
					province_id = 2055
					province_id = 2053
					province_id = 3804
					province_id = 2069
				}
			}
			secede_province = TSI
		}
		TUR = { release_vassal = TSI }
        war = {
            target = TSI
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
        }
		all_core = { add_core = TSI }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "For Mzila! §BPlay as Shangaan§W"
		prestige = -5
		TSI = {
			all_core = { remove_core = TSI }
			primary_culture = nguni
			add_accepted_culture = tonga
			add_accepted_culture = southern_bantu
			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish
			government = absolute_monarchy
                    activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
                    set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
			religion = animist
			clr_country_flag = sunni_country
			set_country_flag = animist_country
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 398493284 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { flintlock_rifles = 1 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3677
					province_id = 2051
					province_id = 2052
					province_id = 2057
					province_id = 3884
					province_id = 2073
					province_id = 3714
					province_id = 2056
					province_id = 2058
					province_id = 3803
					province_id = 2055
					province_id = 2053
					province_id = 3804
					province_id = 2069
				}
			}
			secede_province = TSI
		}
		TUR = { release_vassal = TSI }
        war = {
            target = TSI
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
        }
		all_core = { add_core = TSI }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = TSI
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

    picture = "serbia_borders_later"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1833
		tag = TUR
		has_country_flag = conceded_serbia
		owns = 3933
		SER = { owns = 797 owns = 3932 }
		month = 4
		NOT = {
			war_with = SER
			war_with = RUS
			year = 1836
		}
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
		
    option = {
        name = "We have no choice."
		set_global_flag = hatt_i_sharif_1833
		3934 = { remove_core = BOS remove_core = TUR }
		3933 = { remove_core = TUR }
		3347 = { remove_core = TUR }
		795 = { remove_core = TUR }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3934
					province_id = 3933
					province_id = 3347
					province_id = 795
				}
			}
			secede_province = SER
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						SRR = { ai = yes owns = 3934 war_with = THIS }
						BOS = { ai = yes owns = 3934 war_with = THIS }
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3934 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = SER }
			}
		}
		relation = { who = SER value = 100 }
		SER = { country_event = 18482424 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }

	option = {
        name = "Cede territory? Serbia shall be wiped off the face of the earth!"
		leave_alliance = SER
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = SER
			value = -400
		}
		SER = { country_event = { id = 184825262 days = 1 } }
		RUS = { country_event = 184825263 }
		war = {
			target = SER
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
			call_ally = no
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482528
    title = "The Conquest of Southern Kordofan"
    desc = "With the Shilluk hold over their land diminishing as time passes and Taqali falls into a civil war, a window opens to take over."
    picture = "yao_slave"

    fire_only_once = yes
	
    trigger = {
		year = 1853
		owns = 3699
		owns = 3701
		3700 = { owner = { civilized = no NOT = { tag = THIS } } }
		1839 = { owner = { civilized = no NOT = { tag = THIS } } }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "It is time!"
		prestige = 3
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 3699 = { is_core = EGY } } }
			owner = {
				3700 = { add_core = EGY }
				1839 = { add_core = EGY }
			}
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 3699 = { is_core = THIS } } }
			owner = {
				3700 = { add_core = THIS }
				1839 = { add_core = THIS }
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { OR = {
				owns = 3700
				owns = 1839
			} }
			country_event = 184825281
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We don't need to do this."
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184825281
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ claims Southern Kordofan"
    desc = "The Ottomans have claimed our lands in Kordofan, and move forward to annex them. Should we concede?"
    picture = "yao_slave"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "It will be decided in battle. §R$FROMCOUNTRY$ declares war§W"
		prestige = 5
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					owns = 3700
					NOT = { owns = 1839 }
				}
			}
			owner = { FROM = {
				war = {
					target = THIS
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 3700 }
					call_ally = no
				}
			} }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					owns = 1839
					NOT = { owns = 3700 }
				}
			}
			owner = { FROM = {
				war = {
					target = THIS
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 1839 }
					call_ally = no
				}
			} }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					owns = 1839
					owns = 3700
				}
			}
			owner = { FROM = {
				war = {
					target = THIS
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 1839 }
					call_ally = no
				}
			} }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Concede."
		prestige = -10
		any_owned = {
			limit = { OR = {
				province_id = 3700
				province_id = 1839
			} }
			secede_province = FROM
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

}

        }

		}

            who = FROM

        }

            casus_belli = {
                target = THIS
                type = place_in_the_sun
                months = 36
            }
        }
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.001
            modifier = {
                factor = 1.1
				FROM = { ai = no }
			}
		}
    }

        name = "We cannot spoil more troops."

            who = FROM
            value = 50
        }

			factor = 0.999
		}
    }

    id = 184825311

	is_triggered_only = yes

        name = "We agree."

			OR = {
				province_id = 3952

				province_id = 1849

				province_id = 3696
			} }
			secede_province = UTI
		}
		FROM = { inherit = UTI }
		UTI = { all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }

            who = FROM
            value = 150
        }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { owns = 1875 owns = 3870 owns = 1874 owns = 3706 owns = 3958 owns = 3820 owns = 3937 owns = 3594 owns = 3951 owns = 1859 owns = 1853 owns = 1857 owns = 1856 } } }

				province_id = 1865
			} }

			add_core = AWS
		}

			OR = {
				province_id = 1861
				province_id = 3590
			} }
			secede_province = HAR
			add_core = HAR
		} } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { owns = 1875 owns = 3590 owns = 1861 owns = 3591 owns = 1859 owns = 1853 owns = 1857 owns = 1856 } } }
		owner = { 
		any_owned = { limit = {
			OR = {
				province_id = 3953
				province_id = 1858
				province_id = 1865
			} }
			secede_province = AWS
			add_core = AWS
		}
		} }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { owns = 3937 owns = 3820 owns = 3706 owns = 3958 owns = 3870 owns = 1865 owns = 3951 owns = 1866 owns = 3594 } } }
		owner = { 
		any_owned = { limit = {
			OR = {
				province_id = 1861
				province_id = 3590
			} }
			secede_province = HAR
			add_core = HAR
		}
		} }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

        name = "You're welcome."

		set_country_flag = he_is_indeed
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482534
    title = "The Conquest of Western Dahomey"
    desc = "CONQUESTWESTERNDAHOMEY"
    picture = "dahomey_blockade"

    fire_only_once = yes
    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    trigger = {
		year = 1875
		owns = 3849
        colonial_nation = yes
		owns = 1919
		DAH = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = colonial_railroading_disabled }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 1920 = { OR = { empty = yes owner = { civilized = no ai = yes } } } } }
			owner = { 1920 = { secede_province = THIS } }
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 1922 = { OR = { empty = yes owner = { civilized = no ai = yes } } } } }
			owner = { 1922 = { secede_province = THIS } }
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 3957 = { OR = { empty = yes owner = { civilized = no ai = yes } } } } }
			owner = { 3957 = { secede_province = THIS } }
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 3847 = { OR = { empty = yes owner = { civilized = no ai = yes } } } } }
			owner = { 3847 = { secede_province = THIS } }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482535
    title = "The Subjugation of the Anlo"
    desc = "SUBJUGATIONANLO"
    picture = "subjugate_anlo"

    fire_only_once = yes
    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				owns = 3889
				owns = 1907
			}
			AND = {
				owns = 1907
				1915 = { empty = no }
			}
		}
		3955 = { empty = yes }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { 3955 = { OR = { empty = yes owner = { civilized = no ai = yes } } } } }
			owner = { 3955 = { secede_province = THIS life_rating = 25 any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } } }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}

    id = 18482536
    title = "Taking Control of the Gbe Savanna"
    desc = "We now hold enough influence over the lands of the Gbe that we can centralize the region under our rule."

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		owns = 3849

				3847 = { empty = yes }
				1920 = { empty = yes }

country_event = {
    id = 184825379
    title = "Maba Diakhou Ba's Jihads"
    desc = "MABADIAKHOUBA"
    picture = "marabouts"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1861
		owns = 2573
		has_country_flag = animist_country
		month = 3
		NOT = { year = 1862 }
		BTL = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = sw_set }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = { set_global_flag = diakhou }

    option = {
        name = "These Marabouts are a danger to our state's survival."
		2573 = { secede_province = BTL add_core = BTL }
		BTL = {
			primary_culture = wolof
			add_accepted_culture = fulbe
			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish
			government = theocracy
			religion = sunni
			capital = 2573
			military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
			activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
			define_general = {
				name = "Maba Diakhou Ba"
				personality = defence_2.1
				background = attack_3.1
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = fanatic_army
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		BTL = {
			relation = { who = FRA value = -125 }
			relation = { who = BOR value = -125 }
			relation = { who = GMB value = -85 }
			relation = { who = TOG value = -80 }
			relation = { who = SNG value = 20 }
			relation = { who = WOL value = -10 }
			relation = { who = EQG value = -40 }
			relation = { who = TOO value = 90 }
			relation = { who = XSO value = -10 }
			relation = { who = MLI value = -40 }
			relation = { who = TND value = -30 }
			relation = { who = TRZ value = 40 }
			relation = { who = GBU value = -50 }
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 398493288 }
		2573 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
		}
		2922 = { any_pop = { move_pop = 2573 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We must stop them now!"

			}
		}
		BTL = {
			relation = { who = FRA value = -125 }
			relation = { who = BOR value = -125 }
			relation = { who = GMB value = -85 }
			relation = { who = TOG value = -80 }
			relation = { who = SNG value = 20 }
			relation = { who = WOL value = -10 }
			relation = { who = EQG value = -40 }
			relation = { who = TOO value = 90 }
			relation = { who = XSO value = -10 }
			relation = { who = MLI value = -40 }
			relation = { who = TND value = -30 }
			relation = { who = TRZ value = 40 }
			relation = { who = GBU value = -50 }
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 398493288 }
		2922 = { any_pop = { move_pop = 2573 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Long Live Maba Diakhou Ba! §BPlay as Badibou§W (merge the brigades)"

			relation = { who = EQG value = -40 }
			relation = { who = TOO value = 90 }
			relation = { who = XSO value = -10 }
			relation = { who = MLI value = -40 }
			relation = { who = TND value = -30 }
			relation = { who = TRZ value = 40 }
			relation = { who = GBU value = -50 }
		}
		CLN = { country_event = 398493288 }
		2573 = {
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
			sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current }
		}
		2922 = { any_pop = { move_pop = 2573 } }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = BTL
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

		has_global_flag = dakar_stlouis_railroad

		religion = fetishist
		BTL = { exists = yes }
		month = 1
		NOT = { year = 1865 }
    }

	immediate = { set_global_flag = diakhou }

        name = "We cannot trust Maba Diakhou Ba."
		prestige = 2
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
				ai = yes
			} }
			owner = {
				religion = sunni
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_religion = fetishist } militancy = 6 consciousness = 8 }
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_religion = sunni } militancy = -8 consciousness = -8 }
				BTL = { country_event = 184825371 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We must do it! §BPlay as Badibou§W"

		any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_religion = fetishist } militancy = 6 consciousness = 8 }

		prestige = 2
		release_vassal = KON
		casus_belli = {
			target = KON
			type = establish_protectorate_NI_casus_belli
			months = 120
        }
		war = {
			target = KON
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = establish_protectorate_NI_casus_belli }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 3965 }
			call_ally = no
		}
		KON = { country_event = 184825431 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Quell the rebellion and reestablish a vassal state. §RDeclare war on Kongo§W"
		prestige = -2
		release_vassal = KON
		casus_belli = {
			target = KON
			type = make_puppet_no_add_wargoal
			months = 120
        }
		war = {
			target = KON
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = make_puppet_no_add_wargoal }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 3965 }
			call_ally = no
		}
		KON = { country_event = 184825432 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Let them have their independence."
		prestige = -10
		release_vassal = KON
		KON = { country_event = 184825433 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

country_event = {
    id = 18482545
    title = "Claim Zayla?"
    desc = "Zayla has been ruled by the Ottoman Empire since its conquest in the 17th century, and regardless of our wars with them they have not ceded it. Should we claim it?"
    picture = "barbara_somalia"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1862
		tag = EGY
		TUR = { owns = 1874 }
		OR = {
			owns = 1849
			owns = 3694
			owns = 3692
		}
		month = 4
		OR = {
			vassal_of = TUR
			is_vassal = no
		}
		NOT = { year = 1882 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

    option = {
        name = "Claim it!"
		prestige = 5
		TUR = { country_event = 184825451 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not need Zayla."
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184825451
    title = "The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Ask For Zayla"
    desc = "Zayla has been under our control for centuries, but now it is claimed by the Egyptians. They have asked us to cede the territory to them."
    picture = "barbara_somalia"
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Cede it, it's theirs."
		any_owned = { limit = { OR = {
				province_id = 1875
				province_id = 3870
				province_id = 3820
				province_id = 1874
				province_id = 3967
				province_id = 1851
				province_id = 1858
				province_id = 1865
				province_id = 1861
				province_id = 3590
				province_id = 3706
				province_id = 3958
				province_id = 3707
				province_id = 3818
				province_id = 1873
			} }
			secede_province = UTI
		}
		FROM = { inherit = UTI }
		UTI = { all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { AWS = { vassal_of = TUR } } } owner = { TUR = { release_vassal = AWS } FROM = { create_vassal = AWS } } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { HAR = { vassal_of = TUR } } } owner = { TUR = { release_vassal = HAR } FROM = { create_vassal = HAR } } }
		FROM = { country_event = 184825452 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.999
			modifier = { factor = 0 3590 = { owner = { OR = { vassal_of = THIS tag = THIS } } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0 1858 = { owner = { OR = { vassal_of = THIS tag = THIS } } } }
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Ask for 50,000¤!"
		FROM = { country_event = 184825453 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.001
			modifier = { factor = 1000 3590 = { owner = { OR = { vassal_of = THIS tag = THIS } } } }
			modifier = { factor = 1000 1858 = { owner = { OR = { vassal_of = THIS tag = THIS } } } }
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We won't cede it."
		FROM = { country_event = 184825455 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
}

			}
		} }

				target = FROM
				type = acquire_state
				months = 36
			}
		} }

				target = FROM
				type = place_in_the_sun
				months = 36
			}

		}

country_event = {
    id = 18482546
    title = "The Tripolitanian Civil War"
    desc = "OHNOTRIPOLITANIA"
    picture = "tripoli_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		tag = TRI
		vassal_of = TUR
		year = 1834
		OR = {
			AND = { month = 1 FRA = { any_owned_province = { OR = { is_core = RGA is_core = LBY is_core = ALD } } } }
			month = 6
		}
		NOT = { war_with = TUR }
		NOT = { year = 1836 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 10 }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = hide_tooltip
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = hide_tooltip NOT = { month = 6 } } }
			owner = {
				government = prov_gov_conservative
				TUR = {
					release_vassal = TRI 
					release_vassal = CYR
					diplomatic_influence = { who = TRI value = -300 }
					diplomatic_influence = { who = CYR value = -300 }
					relation = { who = TRI value = -300 }
					relation = { who = CYR value = -300 }
					leave_alliance = TRI
					leave_alliance = CYR
				}
				prestige = -1
				TUR = { country_event = { id = 184825461 days = 1 } }
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1734
							province_id = 1740
							province_id = 1741
							province_id = 1744
							province_id = 1732
						}
					}
					secede_province = THIS
					secede_province = CYR
				}
				TRI = { any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1734
							province_id = 1740
							province_id = 1741
							province_id = 1744
							province_id = 1732
						}
					}
					secede_province = THIS
					secede_province = CYR
				} }
				CYR = {
					government = prov_gov_conservative
					1732 = {
						sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
						sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
						sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
					}
				}
				TUR = {
					release_vassal = TRI 
					release_vassal = CYR
				}
				CYR = { war = {
					target = TRI
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
					call_ally = no
				} }
				set_global_flag = civil_war_tripoli
			}
		}
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = hide_tooltip month = 6 } }
			owner = {
				government = prov_gov_conservative
				TUR = {
					release_vassal = TRI 
					release_vassal = CYR
					diplomatic_influence = { who = TRI value = -300 }
					diplomatic_influence = { who = CYR value = -300 }
					relation = { who = TRI value = -300 }
					relation = { who = CYR value = -300 }
					leave_alliance = TRI
					leave_alliance = CYR
				}
				prestige = -1
				TUR = { country_event = { id = 184825469 days = 1 } }
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1734
							province_id = 1740
							province_id = 1741
							province_id = 1744
							province_id = 1732
						}
					}
					secede_province = THIS
					secede_province = CYR
				}
				TRI = { any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1734
							province_id = 1740
							province_id = 1741
							province_id = 1744
							province_id = 1732
						}
					}
					secede_province = THIS
					secede_province = CYR
				} }
				CYR = {
					government = prov_gov_conservative
					1732 = {
						sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
						sub_unit = { type = irregular value = current }
						sub_unit = { type = cavalry value = current }
					}
				}
				TUR = {
					release_vassal = TRI 
					release_vassal = CYR
				}
				CYR = { war = {
					target = TRI
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
					call_ally = no
				} }
				set_global_flag = civil_war_tripoli
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = hide_tooltip
	}
			

    option = {
        name = "For the Karamanli's new king! §BPlay as Ali II§W"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "For the continued stability of Tripoli! §BPlay as Ibn Ali§W"
		change_tag_no_core_switch = CYR
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 184825465
    title = "Abd al-Jalil Dethrones The Traitor"
    desc = "GREATTRIPOLIAGAIN"
    picture = "tripoli_map"
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		CYR = { all_core = { remove_core = CYR } }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					CYR = { ai = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				TRI = { inherit = CYR }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					CYR = { ai = no }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				change_tag_no_core_switch = TRI
				CLN = { country_event = 184825466 }
			}
		}

country_event = {
    id = 184825467
    title = "$COUNTRY$ Has Won the Tripolitanian Civil War!"
    desc = "After numerous battles, we've been able to beat the other Karamanli successor and reestablish our rule."
    picture = "tripoli_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = civil_war_tripoli
		OR = {
			AND = { tag = TRI CYR = { exists = no } }
			AND = { tag = CYR TRI = { exists = no } }
		}
		has_global_flag = eighteenthirty_startdate
		NOT = { year = 1838 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
    option = {
        name = "We hope this is our last civil war..."
		CYR = { all_core = { remove_core = CYR } }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = TRI
				}
			}
			owner = {
				prestige = 5
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = CYR
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3668 = { secede_province = THIS secede_province = TRI }
				change_tag_no_core_switch = TRI
				CLN = { country_event = 184825468 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 18482548
    title = "The Ottomans Encroach On Algeria"
    desc = "DAWGOTTOSWHATYADOIN"
    picture = "algeria_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = fast_path_algeria
		OR = {
			tag = FRA
			tag = BOR
		}
		OR = {
			ALD = { exists = yes has_country_flag = ottoman_help }
			RGA = { exists = yes has_country_flag = ottoman_help }
			LBY = { exists = yes has_country_flag = ottoman_help }
		}
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }			

    option = {
        name = "Demand that they leave!"
		prestige = 3
		any_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = you_did_it_otto }
			country_event = 184825483
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.95
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Well, we'll be cautious."
		prestige = -3
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Leave Algeria immediately."
		prestige = -15
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { ALD = { exists = yes has_country_flag = ottoman_help } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = ALD
							is_core = LBY
							is_core = RGA
							is_core = ABA
						}
					}
					secede_province = ALD
				}
				ALD = { country_event = 184825481 }
				set_country_flag = left_algeria
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = left_algeria } LBY = { exists = yes has_country_flag = ottoman_help } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = ALD
							is_core = LBY
							is_core = RGA
							is_core = ABA
						}
					}
					secede_province = LBY
				}
				LBY = { country_event = 184825481 }
				set_country_flag = left_algeria
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = left_algeria } RGA = { exists = yes has_country_flag = ottoman_help } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = ALD
							is_core = LBY
							is_core = RGA
							is_core = ABA
						}
					}
					secede_province = RGA
				}
				RGA = { country_event = 184825481 }
				set_country_flag = left_algeria
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = you_did_it_otto }
			country_event = 184825482
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.05
		}
    }

}

country_event = {
    id = 184825495
    title = "Centralize our Algerian possessions"
    desc = "ALGERIACENTRALIZED"
    picture = "tripoli_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = yesturyestur
		tag = TUR
		1700 = { OR = { owner = { tag = THIS vassal_of = THIS } } }
		3826 = { OR = { owner = { tag = THIS vassal_of = THIS } } }
		1710 = { OR = { owner = { tag = THIS vassal_of = THIS } } }
		NOT = { year = 1855 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
    option = {
        name = "Create a sole Algerian possession."
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ALD = { exists = no }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				ALD = { all_core = { remove_core = ALD add_core = RGA } }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ALD = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
					RGA = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = ALD
				ALD = { all_core = { remove_core = ALD add_core = RGA } }
				RGA = { inherit = ALD }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ALD = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
					RGA = { exists = no }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				ALD = { change_tag = RGA }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ABA = { exists = no }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				ABA = { all_core = { remove_core = ABA add_core = RGA } }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ABA = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
					RGA = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = ABA
				ABA = { all_core = { remove_core = ABA add_core = RGA } }
				RGA = { inherit = ABA }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					LBY = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
					RGA = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = LBY
				LBY = { all_core = { remove_core = LBY add_core = RGA } }
				RGA = { inherit = LBY }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					TUG = { exists = no }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				TUG = { all_core = { remove_core = TUG add_core = RGA } }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					TUG = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
					RGA = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = TUG
				TUG = { all_core = { remove_core = TUG add_core = RGA } }
				RGA = { inherit = TUG }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "The current situation is fine."
		prestige = 2
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}
country_event = {
    id = 184825491
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ Wins the War"
    desc = "After numerous battles, we've lost the war againt the French, and we have to give in."
    picture = "algeria_map"
    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Great."
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = ALD
					is_core = RGA
					is_core = ABA
					is_core = LBY
				}
			}
			secede_province = UTI
		}
		FROM = { inherit = UTI }
		UTI = { all_core = { remove_core = UTI } }
		any_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = ottoman_help }
			clr_country_flag = ottoman_help
			clr_country_flag = otto_direct
			country_event = 184825492
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482550
    title = "The Habr Yunis Sultanate"
    desc = "SULTANATEYUNISHABR"
    picture = "habr_yunis"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1851
		tag = ISQ
		owns = 3820
		HAR = { owns = 3590 }
		month = 4
		NOT = { year = 1853 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }			

    option = {
        name = "Well, I guess we lost."
		prestige = -3
		relation = { who = HBR value = 10 }
		3820 = {
			add_core = HBR
			secede_province = HBR
		}
		HBR = { country_event = 184825503 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Fight them!"
		prestige = 2
		HBR = { country_event = 184825501 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

			add_core = THIS
		}

			target = THIS
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 3820 }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
			call_ally = yes
		} }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.5
		}

    is_triggered_only = yes

				owner = {
					has_country_flag = hide_tooltip
				}
			}
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = {
						owner = {

							3394 = { empty = yes }

							1711 = { empty = yes }

							owns = 3668
							3394 = { empty = yes }
							3685 = { empty = yes }
							1711 = { empty = yes }
							3842 = { empty = yes }
						}
					}
					3394 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
					3685 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
					1711 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
					3842 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
				}

					limit = {

							owns = 3668

							3685 = { empty = yes }
							1711 = { empty = yes }
						}
					}
					3394 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
					3685 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
					1711 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							owns = 3668
							3394 = { empty = yes }
							3842 = { empty = yes }
						}
					}
					3394 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }

						}
					}
					3394 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
				}
				
				random_owned = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							NOT = {
								FRA = { has_country_flag = organize_algeria_1848 }
								BOR = { has_country_flag = organize_algeria_1848 }
							}
							owns = 1711
							NOT = { any_owned_province = { OR = { is_core = ALD is_core = LBY is_core = RGA is_core = TUN } NOT = { province_id = 1711 province_id = 3685 } } }
							NOT = { has_global_flag = france_already_got_angered }
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = france_already_got_angered
					any_country = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								tag = FRA
								tag = BOR
							}
							owns = 1700
						}
						country_event = 18482551
					}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = hide_tooltip
	}

    desc = "MORETRIPOLITANIAPLEASE"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ask_the_ottos
		owns = 1731
		OR = {
			tag = TUR
			tag = ALA
			tag = ARU
		}
		OR = {
			owns = 1741
			owns = 1736
			owns = 1752
			owns = 3668
		}
		war = no
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "They are too powerful, we should give in."
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = CYR
					is_core = TRI
				}
			}
			secede_province = CYR
		}
		CYR = { country_event = 184825525 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.6
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Ask them to go back to their desert."
		prestige = 5
		CYR = { country_event = 184825526 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.4
		}
    }

		}

country_event = {
    id = 18482553
    title = "We Win the Tripolitanian Civil War!"
    desc = "We have won numerous battles around Tripoli, and we have finally defeated the rest of the pretenders."
    picture = "senussi_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = civil_war_tripoli
		OR = {
			AND = { tag = CYR TRI = { exists = no } }
			AND = { tag = TRI CYR = { exists = no } }
		}
		government = prov_gov_conservative
		OR = {
			owns = 1731
			owns = 1732
		}
		OR = { war = no war_with = TUR }
		is_vassal = no
		NOT = { year = 1842 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Huzzah!"
		prestige = 5
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					tag = CYR
				}
			}
			owner = {
				change_tag = TRI
			}
		}
		CYR = { all_core = { remove_core = CYR } }
		government = absolute_empire
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482554
    title = "Independence!"
    desc = "We have gained independence from our overlords."
    picture = "administration"

    trigger = {
		tag = JOR
		owns = 2639
		vassal_of = TUR
		NOT = { neighbour = TUR }
		NOT = {
			any_neighbor_country = { vassal_of = TUR neighbour = TUR }
			any_neighbor_country = { vassal_of = TUR NOT = { neighbour = TUR } any_neighbor_country = { vassal_of = TUR neighbour = TUR } }
			any_neighbor_country = { vassal_of = TUR NOT = { neighbour = TUR } any_neighbor_country = { vassal_of = TUR NOT = { neighbour = TUR } any_neighbor_country = { vassal_of = TUR neighbour = TUR } } }
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { any_owned_province = { is_coastal = yes } }
			TUR = { NOT = { any_owned_province = { is_coastal = yes } } }
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = got_away_once }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 10 }

    option = {
        name = "Huzzah!"
		prestige = 5
		set_country_flag = got_away_once
		government = absolute_monarchy
		overlord = { release_vassal = THIS country_event = 184825541 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
}

		}

		prestige = 4
		random_owned = {

					OR = {
						capital_scope = { continent = africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = west_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = central_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = east_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = south_africa }
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				war = {
					target = FROM
					attacker_goal = {
						casus_belli = acquire_any_state
						state_province_id = 2635
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						capital_scope = { continent = africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = west_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = central_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = east_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = south_africa }
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				casus_belli = {
					target = FROM
					type = place_in_the_sun
					months = 36
				}
				war = {
					target = FROM
					attacker_goal = {
						casus_belli = place_in_the_sun
						state_province_id = 2635
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }

}

    title = "The Famine of $YEAR$"
    desc = "FAMINESMAHDISTS"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1883
		tag = SUD
		war = yes
		national_provinces_occupied = 0.3
		government = theocracy
		month = 4
		NOT = { money = 1000000 }
		NOT = { year = 1886 }
    }

country_event = {
    id = 18482558
    title = "Cede the Colony of Natal to the Cape Colony?"
    desc = "COLONYNATALANNEX"
    picture = "natal_colony_flag"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1845
		tag = ENG
		owns = 3900
		month = 3
		3900 = { is_core = NAL }
		NAL = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1847 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "We need to centralize the Cape Colony."
		any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = boer } militancy = 4 consciousness = 3 }
		NAL = { all_core = { remove_core = NAL add_core = SAF } }
		set_global_flag = natal_colony_gone
		relation = {
			who = ZUL
			value = 60
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "This situation can only be detrimental to our colony. §R(Pay 30,000¤)§W"
		treasury = -30000
		relation = {
			who = ZUL
			value = -100
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = british location = { is_core = SAF } } militancy = 6 consciousness = 5 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184825581
    title = "Reinstate the Colony of Natal?"
    desc = "COLONYNATALREINSTATE"
    picture = "natal_colony_flag"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = klipriver_republic
		has_global_flag = natal_colony_gone
		year = 1856
		tag = ENG
		owns = 3900
		month = 3
		3900 = { NOT = { is_core = NAL } is_core = SAF }
		NAL = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1858 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = natal_colony_nomore }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "We need to reinstate the Colony of Natal. §G(Gain 15,000¤)§W"
		treasury = 15000
		any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = boer } militancy = -4 consciousness = -3 }
		clr_global_flag = natal_colony_gone
		relation = {
			who = ZUL
			value = -60
		}
		3902 = { add_core = NAL }
		2111 = { add_core = NAL }
		3900 = { add_core = NAL }
		2112 = { add_core = NAL }
		3899 = { add_core = NAL }
		3942 = { add_core = NAL }
		2113 = { add_core = NAL }
		3943 = { add_core = NAL }
		3897 = { add_core = NAL }
		NAL = { government = colonial_company }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "Why would we grant autonomy to Natal?"
		prestige = 2
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

    id = 18482559
    title = "The Klip River Republic"
    desc = "KLIPRIVERREPUBLIC"
    picture = "klip_river"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = natal_colony_gone
		year = 1847
		tag = ZUL
		owns = 2112
		month = 3
		ENG = { owns = 3900 }
		NAL = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1849 }
	}

	immediate = { set_global_flag = klipriver_republic CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825599 days = 150 } } }

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "We need to overcome Albion. §G(Gain 20,000¤)§W"
		treasury = 20000
		2112 = {
            any_pop = {
                limit = { has_pop_culture = boer }
                reduce_pop = 1.3
            }
		}
		2112 = { secede_province = NAL add_core = NAL remove_core = THIS }
		create_alliance = NAL
		NAL = { government = prov_gov_conservative }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "For the independence of the Klip River! §BPlay as Klip River§W"
		2112 = {
            any_pop = {
                limit = { has_pop_culture = boer }
                reduce_pop = 1.3
            }
		}
		treasury = 20000
		2112 = { secede_province = NAL add_core = NAL remove_core = THIS }
		create_alliance = NAL
		NAL = { government = prov_gov_conservative }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = NAL
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

		name = "Why, do we want another war with the Boers?"
		prestige = 3
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

    id = 184825599
    title = "The Klip River Republic"

    picture = "klip_river"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

        name = "We respect the Klip River Republic's sovereignty."
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NAL = { ai = no war = no owns = 2112 exists = yes } } } owner = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825596 days = 150 } } } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NAL = { ai = yes war = no owns = 2112 exists = yes } } } owner = { ENG = { country_event = { id = 184825591 days = 2 } } } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NAL = { exists = no } 2112 = { is_core = NAL } 3900 = { NOT = { is_core = NAL } } } } owner = { NAL = { all_core = { remove_core = NAL } } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }

}

		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NAL = { exists = no } 2112 = { is_core = NAL } 3900 = { NOT = { is_core = NAL } } } } owner = { NAL = { all_core = { remove_core = NAL } } } }

    }

		}

				NAL = { ai = no }
			}
		}

country_event = {
    id = 18482560
    title = "The Transvaal Civil War"
    desc = "TRANSVAALCIVILNOWAR"
    picture = "transvaal_1850"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1862
		tag = TRN
		month = 9
		NRB = { exists = yes NOT = { owns = 3969 } }
		NOT = { year = 1864 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = transvaal_civil_war }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = { set_global_flag = transvaal_civil_war }

    option = {
		name = "The cruelty of war in the heart of Transvaal..."
		prestige = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = no
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 2
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 3969 #Schoeman, leader in Zoutpansberg was opposed
						province_id = 2074 #Schoeman, leader in Zoutpansberg was opposed
						province_id = 3945 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
						province_id = 3648 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
						province_id = 3899 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
						province_id = 3942 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
					}
					owned_by = THIS
				}
			}
			consciousness = 6
			militancy = 8
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2107
						province_id = 2109
					}
					owned_by = THIS
				}
			}
			consciousness = 3
			militancy = 5
		}
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = national_instability
            duration = 405
        }
		2074 = { add_core = TRN }
		3969 = { add_core = TRN }
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 184825601
    title = "The Transvaal Civil War"
    desc = "TRANSVAALCIVILWAR"
    picture = "transvaal_1850"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1862
		tag = TRN
		month = 9
		NOT = { year = 1864 }
		NRB = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = transvaal_civil_war }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = transvaal_civil_war
		set_global_flag = transvaal_civil_warcores
	}

    option = {
		name = "For Paul Kruger!"
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = national_instability
            duration = 355
        }
		2074 = { add_core = TRN }
		3969 = { add_core = TRN }
		3945 = { add_core = TRN }
		NRB = { all_core = { remove_core = NRB } }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2074
					province_id = 3969
					province_id = 3945
				}
			}
			secede_province = NRB
		}
		NRB = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = national_instability
				duration = 355
			}
			government = prov_gov_conservative
		}
		war = {
			target = NRB
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = conquest_any
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy
			}
			call_ally = no
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}

    option = {
		name = "For Stephanus Schoeman!"
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = national_instability
            duration = 355
        }
		2074 = { add_core = TRN }
		3969 = { add_core = TRN }
		3945 = { add_core = TRN }
		NRB = { all_core = { remove_core = NRB } }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2074
					province_id = 3969
					province_id = 3945
				}
			}
			secede_province = NRB
		}
		NRB = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = national_instability
				duration = 355
			}
			government = prov_gov_conservative
		}
		war = {
			target = NRB
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = conquest_any
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy
			}
			call_ally = no
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = NRB
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

						province_id = 3648 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed

country_event = {
    id = 184825603
    title = "We Win the Transvaal Civil War!"
    desc = "We have won the Transvaal Civil War after defeating Paul Kruger, and we can now establish control."
    picture = "transvaal_1850"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = transvaal_civil_warcores
		tag = NRB
		OR = {
			AND = { war = no TRN = { exists = no } owns = 2105 }
			AND = { war = no TRN = { exists = yes war = no } }
			AND = { TRN = { vassal_of = THIS } }
		}
		government = prov_gov_conservative #Schoeman
		NOT = { year = 1870 }

			limit = {

					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = TRN
			}

				}
			}
			secede_province = ORA
		}

			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = no
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 1
		}

        political_reform = wealth_weighted_voting
        political_reform = appointed
        political_reform = jefferson_method
        political_reform = state_controlled
        political_reform = gerrymandering
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }

        }

			limit = {

					TRN = {

					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = TRN
			}
		}

				}
			}

				inherit = TRN
			}
		}

		year = 1862
		tag = NRB
		month = 9
		exists = yes
		NOT = { year = 1864 }
		TRN = { exists = yes owns = 2105 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = transvaal_civil_war }
	}

		set_global_flag = transvaal_civil_war

		NRB = { exists = no }

	}

		remove_country_modifier = national_confusion

		3945 = { add_core = TRN remove_core = NRB }

			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = no
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 1
		}

			limit = {
				location = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 3969 #Schoeman, leader in Zoutpansberg was opposed
						province_id = 2074 #Schoeman, leader in Zoutpansberg was opposed
						province_id = 3945 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
						province_id = 3648 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
						province_id = 3899 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
						province_id = 3942 #Joubert, leader in Lydenberg was opposed
					}
					owned_by = THIS
				}
			}
			consciousness = 4
			militancy = 5
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2107
						province_id = 2109
					}
					owned_by = THIS
				}
			}

    }

    }

			add_province_modifier = {
				name = war_torn
				duration = 505
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { continent = east_africa }
				pop_type = slaves
			}
			militancy = 9
			consciousness = 7
		}
		random_list = {
			7 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825635 days = 10 } } } #you_won
			8 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825635 days = 15 } } } #you_won_later
			14 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825636 days = 15 } } } #phyrric_victory
			15 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825636 days = 20 } } } #phyrric_victory_later
			15 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825637 days = 12 } } } #phyrric_defeat
			18 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825637 days = 17 } } } #phyrric_defeat_later
			10 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825638 days = 14 } } } #you_lost
			11 = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 184825638 days = 19 } } } #you_lost_later
        }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "We must hire mercenaries to stop the rebellion. §R(Pay 50,000¤)§W"
		set_country_flag = zigua_historical_revolt
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					ai = no
				}
			}
			owner = {
				treasury = -50000
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {

    desc = "TOTALVICTORYOMAN"
    picture = "zigua_rebellion"

	is_triggered_only = yes

        name = "Great!"

			limit = {
				owner = {
					OMA = {
						owns = 2048
						owns = 3875

						slavery = yes_slavery
					}
					2037 = { owned_by = SMB }
					2048 = { any_pop = { has_pop_culture = lacustrine_bantu pop_type = slaves } }
					NOT = { year = 1847 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				OMA = { country_event = { id = 184825631 days = 1 } }
				set_global_flag = yeahomanhappens
			}
		}

			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {

country_event = {
    id = 18482564
    title = "Rebellion in Zanzibar"
    desc = "OMANHOWTHEZIGUA"
    picture = "zigua_rebellion"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ziguavictory
		year = 1844
		tag = OMA
		3875 = { owned_by = OMA }
		OMA = { exists = yes slavery = yes_slavery }
		MZR = {
			OR = {
				vassal_of = THIS
				AND = { has_global_flag = zanzibarexists exists = no }
			}
		}
		NOT = { year = 1849 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = zanzibarrevolt }
	}
	
	immediate = { set_global_flag = zanzibarrevolt }

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 6 }

    option = {
		name = "This is the worst scenario possible."
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MZR = { vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = MZR
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2048
					province_id = 2038
					province_id = 3875
					province_id = 2037
					province_id = 3872
				}
			}
			secede_province = MZR
		}
		war = {
			target = MZR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
		}
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = national_instability
            duration = 505
        }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "For Zanzibar! §BPlay as Zanzibar§W"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					MZR = { vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				release_vassal = MZR
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2048
					province_id = 2038
					province_id = 3875
					province_id = 2037
					province_id = 3872
				}
			}
			secede_province = MZR
		}
		war = {
			target = MZR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
		}
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = national_instability
            duration = 505
        }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MZR
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184825641
    title = "The Zigua Ask for Support"
    desc = "MAZRUIWHYTHE"
    picture = "zigua_rebellion"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ziguavictory
		year = 1844
		tag = MZR
		is_vassal = no
		3875 = { owned_by = OMA }
		OMA = { exists = yes slavery = yes_slavery }
		NOT = { year = 1849 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = zanzibarrevolt }
	}
	
	immediate = { set_global_flag = zanzibarrevolt }

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 6 }

    option = {
		name = "We will help the Zigua! §RDeclare war on Oman§W"
		3874 = { add_core = MZR }
		OMA = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2048
						province_id = 2038
						province_id = 3875
						province_id = 2037
						province_id = 3872
					}
				}
				secede_province = THIS
			}
		}
		war = {
			target = OMA
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
		}
		OMA = { country_event = 184825642 }
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					pop_type = slaves
					has_pop_culture = lacustrine_bantu
					has_pop_culture = kikuyu
				}
			}
			militancy = -6
			consciousness = -4
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "This isn't worth it."
		prestige = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					pop_type = slaves
					has_pop_culture = lacustrine_bantu
					has_pop_culture = kikuyu
				}
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 3
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482565
    title = "The Zigua Conquest of the Pangani Valley"
    desc = "ZIGUAAGAINSTSHAMBAA"
    picture = "zigua_rebellion"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1851
		tag = SMB
		owns = 3874
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = ziguaalmostwon
			has_global_flag = ziguawonabit
			has_global_flag = ziguavictory
		}
		NOT = { owns = 2037 }
		NOT = { year = 1855 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	immediate = {
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { flintlock_rifles = 1 }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons
				set_country_flag = using_foreign_weapons
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
		name = "We should hold no matter the cost."
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					location = { province_id = 3874 }
					pop_type = slaves
				}
			}
			militancy = 7
			consciousness = 6
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					2037 = { is_core = MZR }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3874 = { add_core = MZR }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					2037 = { is_core = OMA }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3874 = { add_core = OMA }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					location = { province_id = 3874 }
					pop_type = slaves
				}
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 2
		}
		3874 = { secede_province = --- life_rating = -25 }

			factor = 1
		}

			}
		}

				}
			}

			}
		}

			}

				2063 = { add_core = MOZ }
			}
		}

				}
			}

country_event = {
    id = 184825663
    title = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ Refuses to Cede Tungi"

	is_triggered_only = yes

        war = {
            target = FROM
            attacker_goal = { casus_belli = demand_concession_casus_belli_no_infamy state_province_id = 3970 }
            defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
            call_ally = no
        }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3678 = { is_core = MOZ }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3970 = { add_core = MOZ }
				2063 = { add_core = MOZ }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3678 = { is_core = AGC }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3970 = { add_core = AGC }
				2063 = { add_core = AGC }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.5
		}
	}
    option = {
		name = "We can't go to war right now."
		prestige = -3
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.5
		}
	}

}

country_event = {
    id = 18482568
    title = "The uSuthu-Mandlakazi Conflict"
    desc = "BATTLEMSEBE"
    picture = "zibhebhu"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		year = 1883
		tag = ZUL
		month = 3
		OR = {
			AND = { TRN = { owns = 3899 } owns = 3942 }
			AND = { TRN = { owns = 3648 } owns = 3899 }
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				vassal_of = ENG
				OR = {
					AND = { ENG = { owns = 2112 owns = 3900 } owns = 3943 }
					AND = { NAL = { owns = 2112 owns = 3900 vassal_of = ENG } owns = 3943 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				vassal_of = ENL
				OR = {
					AND = { ENL = { owns = 2112 owns = 3900 } owns = 3943 }
					AND = { NAL = { owns = 2112 owns = 3900 vassal_of = ENL } owns = 3943 }
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { year = 1885 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
		name = "This situation can only be detrimental to our sovereignty."
		prestige = -2
        add_country_modifier = {
            name = national_instability
            duration = 505
        }
	}
}

    id = 184825692

			who = FROM
			value = 100
		}

			} }

			}
		}

			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = no foreign_officers = no_foreign_officers
			} }
			owner = {
				military_reform = yes_foreign_officers
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			}
		}

				civilized = no army_schools = no_army_schools
			} }
			owner = {
				military_reform = yes_army_schools
				activate_technology = army_command_principle
			}
		}

				civilized = no research_reform = no_research_reform
			} }
			owner = {
				economic_reform = yes_research_reform
				plurality = 5
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes
			} }
			owner = {
				plurality = 5
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { malthusian_thought = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = malthusian_thought
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { late_enlightenment_philosophy = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = late_enlightenment_philosophy
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { flintlock_rifles = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { military_staff_system = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			}
		}

			} }
			owner = {
				plurality = 5
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { malthusian_thought = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = malthusian_thought
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { late_enlightenment_philosophy = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = late_enlightenment_philosophy
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { flintlock_rifles = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { military_staff_system = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = military_staff_system
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = {
				civilized = yes NOT = { army_command_principle = 1 }
			} }
			owner = {
				activate_technology = army_command_principle
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = boer_support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

}
country_event = {
    id = 184825693
    title = "The Battle of Tshaneni"
    desc = "BATTLETSHANENI"
    picture = "dinuzulu_battle"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1884
		tag = ZUL
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = british_support
			has_global_flag = boer_support
			has_global_flag = no_zulu_support
		}
		month = 5
		NOT = { year = 1888 }
    }

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

    option = {
        name = "Great."
		prestige = 5
		remove_country_modifier = national_instability
		random_owned = { limit = {
			owner = {
				has_global_flag = boer_support
			} }
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = nieuwe_republiek
			}
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482484
    title = "The Annexation of Zululand"
    desc = "Zululand has been annexed by the local colonial authorities after the Boer have fortified their new holdings in their borders."
    picture = "zulu"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1887
		tag = ENG
		ZUL = { exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
		NOT = {
			NRB = { owns = 2113 vassal_of = TRN has_global_flag = nieuwe_republiek }
		}
		month = 1
		NOT = { year = 1896 }
    }

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "Great!"
		release_vassal = ZUL
		inherit = ZUL
		ZUL = { all_core = { add_core = SAF } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { SAF = { exists = yes vassal_of = ENG } } } owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = SAF } secede_province = SAF } } }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482570
    title = "The Nieuwe Republiek"
    desc = "NIEUWEREPUBLIEK"
    picture = "niewe_republiek"
    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		has_global_flag = nieuwe_republiek
		year = 1884
		tag = TRN
		owns = 2105
		owns = 3899
		ZUL = { owns = 3942 vassal_of = ENG }
		month = 7
		NRB = { exists = no }
		NOT = { year = 1890 }
    }

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }

    option = {
        name = "We need a port in St. Lucia!"
		prestige = 7
		NRB = {
			all_core = { remove_core = NRB }
			government = democracy
			political_reform = universal_voting
			political_reform = secret_ballots
		}
		ZUL = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 3942
						province_id = 2113
						province_id = 3899
					}
				}
				secede_province = THIS
				secede_province = NRB
			}
		}
		3942 = { add_core = NRB }
		2113 = { add_core = NRB }
		3899 = { add_core = NRB }
		create_vassal = NRB
		ZUL = { country_event = 184825701 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }

    option = {
        name = "For the Nieuwe Republiek! §BPlay as Nieuwe Republiek§W"
		prestige = 7
		NRB = {
			all_core = { remove_core = NRB }
			government = democracy
			political_reform = universal_voting
			political_reform = secret_ballots
		}
		ZUL = { any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3942
					province_id = 2113
					province_id = 3899
				}
			}
			secede_province = THIS
			secede_province = NRB
		} }
		3942 = { add_core = NRB }
		2113 = { add_core = NRB }
		3899 = { add_core = NRB }
		create_vassal = NRB
		ZUL = { country_event = 184825701 }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = NRB
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Why would we take part of Zululand?"
		prestige = -4
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

		} }
		3969 = { any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sotho
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 5
			reduce_pop = 0.99
		} }
    }
}

			personality = defence_2.1

		}

        }
	}

		}

country_event = {
    id = 18482581
    title = "The Yao Convert to Islam"
    desc = "YAOCONVERT"
    picture = "yao_map"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		year = 1861
		owns = 2038
        OR = {
            has_country_flag = sunni_country
            has_country_flag = shiite_country
            has_country_flag = ibadi_country
        }
        OR = {
            3806 = { empty = yes }
            3791 = { empty = yes }
            2581 = { empty = yes }
            3979 = { empty = yes }
            2040 = { empty = yes }
            3678 = { empty = yes }
            2041 = { empty = yes }
        }
		3791 = { culture = yao }
		NOT = { year = 1865 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
    option = {
        name = "The conversions must continue!"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					3806 = { empty = yes }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				3806 = { any_pop = {
					limit = { religion = animist has_pop_culture = yao }
					reduce_pop = 0.75
				} }
				3806 = { any_pop = {
					limit = { religion = sunni has_pop_culture = yao }
					reduce_pop = 3.3
				} }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {

    desc = "INHAMINGAGONE"

	   tag = GAZ
       owns = 3803

		owns = 2055
	   }
	   NOT = {
		owns = 2053
	   }
	   NOT = {
		owns = 2059
	   }
	   NOT = {
		owns = 2057
	   }
	   NOT = {
		owns = 2058

country_event = {
    id = 18482596
    title = "The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Demand That We Cede Northern Zanzibar"
    desc = "NORTHERNZANZIBARNOOO"
    picture = "Administration"
	is_triggered_only = yes
    fire_only_once = yes

    option = {
        name = "We have no choice but to surrender Kenya."
		prestige = -5
		FROM = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = 80 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = 50 }
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = ENG_2024
					region = ENG_2026
				}
			}
			secede_province = FROM
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					KNY = { exists = no }
					FROM = { OR = { owns = 2030 owns = 3850 owns = 3872 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				KNY = {
					government = colonial_company
					add_accepted_culture = british
					set_country_flag = british_accepted
				}
				ENG_2026 = { add_core = KNY }
				ENG_2024 = { add_core = KNY }
			}
		}
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Perfidious Albion cannot demand land from us."
		prestige = 5
		FROM = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = -80 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -100 }
		}
		FROM = {
			casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = demand_concession_casus_belli_no_infamy
				months = 36
			}
		}
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 18482597
    title = "Abdelkader Asks for Free Passage"
    desc = "ABDELKADERGONNACAUSEACRISISAGAIN"
    picture = "battle_of_isly"

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
		tag = MOR
		OR = {
			year = 1840
			AND = { has_global_flag = iron_gates_expedition 1705 = { owned_by = ALD controlled_by = FRA } }
		}
		owns = 3838
		1684 = { owner = { OR = { vassal_of = THIS tag = THIS } } }
		OR = { 1707 = { owned_by = ALD } 1705 = { owned_by = ALD } }
		ALD = { war_with = FRA any_owned_province = { unit_in_battle = yes } }
		war = no
		NOT = { has_global_flag = nomoroccanfrenchwar }
		NOT = { year = 1855 }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 1
    }

    option = {
        name = "We must aid Abdelkader in his time of need."
		prestige = 3
		set_country_flag = hide_tooltip
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
		has_country_flag = hide_tooltip
		}} owner = { 
		FRA = { country_event = 184825971 }
		} }
		clr_country_flag = hide_tooltip
        ai_chance = { factor = 0.9 }
    }

    option = {
        name = "Do not grant him passage."
		prestige = -5
        any_pop = {
            limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
            scaled_militancy = {
                ideology = conservative
                factor = 1
            }
            scaled_militancy = {
                ideology = reactionary
                factor = 1
            }
        }
        ai_chance = { factor = 0.1 }
    }
}

			limit = {

				}
			}

					all_core = { remove_core = MKN }

					add_accepted_culture = mashriqi
					religion = shiite
					remove_accepted_culture = kurdish

		war = {
			target = FROM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = make_puppet_no_add_wargoal }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 926 }
		} }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The tribes of Mesopotamia must be subjugated. §RGain 3 infamy§W"
		release_vassal = FROM
		badboy = 3
		prestige = 2
		TUR = { war = {
			target = FROM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_any_state state_province_id = 926 }
		} }
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

		prestige = 2

    }

country_event = {
    id = 18482614
    title = "Huwaizah Is Destroyed By a Dam Failure"
    desc = "GONEYESHUAIZ"
    picture = "hazahdam"

    fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = KHZ
		war = no
		owns = 1131
		PLS = { owns = 3351 war = no }
		year = 1833
		month = 10
		has_global_flag = eighteenthirty_startdate
		NOT = { year = 1840 }
	}

    option = {
        name = "The Emirate has crumbled... (game over)"
		prestige = -10
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					vassal_of = PER
				}
			}
			owner = { set_global_flag = yasPER }
		}
		1131 = { secede_province = PLS }
		PLS = { country_event = 184826141 }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184826141
    title = "The Mushasha Are Destroyed By a Dam Failure"
    desc = "GONEYESHUAIZA"
    picture = "hazahdam"

    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "The Muhammara shall lead Arabestan!"
		treasury = 3000
		change_tag = KHZ
		government = absolute_monarchy
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_global_flag = yasPER
				}
			}
			owner = { PER = { country_event = 184826142 } }
		}
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Claim the Mushasha throne."
		capital = 1131
		change_tag = KHZ
		government = absolute_empire
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_global_flag = yasPER
				}
			}
			owner = { PER = { create_vassal = KHZ } }
		}
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 18482616
    title = "Ask for Protection?"
    desc = "ASKFORPROTECTIONKHZ"
    picture = "azzubayriraq"

    fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = KHZ
		NOT = { in_sphere = TUR }
		year = 1841
		is_vassal = no
		neighbour = PER
		PER = { war_with = ENG }
		NOT = { year = 1860 }
	}

    option = {
        name = "We can't afford to lose sovereignty."
		prestige = 2
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We need protection or we'll be annexed."
		prestige = -2
		PER = { country_event = 184826161 }
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184826161
    title = "Arabestan Asks For Protection"
    desc = "ASKFORPROTECTIONKHZPER"
    picture = "azzubayriraq"

    fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "They do not deserve any sovereignty."
		prestige = 2
        ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
    }
    option = {
        name = "No problem, our doors are always open."
		create_vassal = KHZ
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 1131
					province_id = 3351
					province_id = 1132
				}
			}
			secede_province = KHZ
		}
        ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
    }
} #asks persia for protection, also give it content it's literally free

    id = 18482617

    desc = "DLALANOLOCINTENDED"
    picture = "administration"

    fire_only_once = yes

    option = {
        name = "Thanks."
		overlord = { military_access = THIS }
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184826171
    title = "The Bohtan Empire Asks For An Alliance"
    desc = "GUHWEDIDITAGAINBHT"
    picture = "bohtan"
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "We will not bow down to Bohtan!"
		prestige = 2
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = { tag = MLN tag = BTL tag = BZD }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { tag = MLN tag = BTL tag = BNB tag = SRN tag = BZD }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { tag = BNB tag = SRN }
			}
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We need to be better protected."
		prestige = -5
		TUR = { release_vassal = THIS any_owned = { limit = { is_core = THIS } secede_province = THIS } country_event = 184826173 }
		BHT = { create_vassal = THIS }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { tag = MLN tag = BTL tag = BNB tag = SRN tag = BZD }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				NOT = { tag = MLN tag = BTL tag = BZD }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { tag = BNB tag = SRN }
			}
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "Agree to revolt separately."
		prestige = 5
		create_alliance = BHT
		set_country_flag = will_revolt
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { tag = MLN tag = BTL tag = BZD }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { tag = MLN tag = BTL tag = BNB tag = SRN tag = BZD }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = { tag = BNB tag = SRN }
			}
		}
    }
}
country_event = {
    id = 184826172
    title = "The Bohtan Empire Asks For An Alliance"
    desc = "GUHWEDIDITAGAINBHT"
    picture = "bohtan"
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "Let Bahdinan secede to them, and revolt separately."
		prestige = 1
		3325 = { secede_province = BHT }
		create_alliance = BHT
		set_country_flag = will_revolt
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We will not bow down to Bohtan!"
		prestige = 2
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "We need to be better protected."
		prestige = -5
		TUR = { release_vassal = THIS any_owned = { limit = { is_core = THIS } secede_province = THIS } country_event = 184826173 }
		BHT = { create_vassal = THIS }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 184826174
    title = "The Ottoman Empire Declares War"
    desc = "DECLARATIONOFPAINBHT"
    picture = "tasini"
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "It is time for the revolt to commence."
		add_country_modifier = { name = rally_tribesmen4 duration = 730 }
		any_country = { limit = { OR = { AND = { tag = BNB ai = yes } has_country_flag = will_revolt } country_event = 184826175 }
	}
}
country_event = {
    id = 184826175
    title = "The Ottoman Empire Declares War"
    desc = "DECLARATIONOFPAINOTHERS"
    picture = "tasini"
	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = "It is time for the revolt to commence."
		add_country_modifier = { name = rally_tribesmen4 duration = 730 }
		TUR = { release_vassal = THIS }
		TUR = { war = {
			target = THIS
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate_no_infamy }
		} }
	}
}
